zul: kumele sithathe izinyathelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi ezibhedlela kanye nasemitholampilo yethu zikhona zonke izinsiza-kusebenza kanye nezinsiza-sidingo ezidingekayo ukuze lezi zikhungo zikwazi ukusebenza kahle futhi ngobunyoninco.

sot: nkgono ya dilemo di 80 ha a ka ke, ebile ha a tshwanela ho qeta letsatsi lohle a le moleng a emetse ho fumana meriana ya hae.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi ugogo oneminyaka yobudala engama-80 achithe usuku lonke emgqeni elinde imithi yakhe.

sot: mokudi a ke ke a kgutlisetswa morao ka lebaka la kgaello ya dingaka le baoki.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi umuntu ogula kakhulu ajikiswe, kuthiwe makabuyele ekhaya, ngenxa nje yokuntuleka kodokotela nabahlengikazi.

sot: bophelo ba ngwana ya so belehwe eo mmae a leng mathuleng a ho beleha, bo ke ke ba bewa tlokotsing ka lebaka la koloi ya bakudi e diehileng ho fihla.
zul: kuyinto engalungile neze ukuthi impilo yengane engakazalwa, yowesifazane obelethayo, ibe sengcupheni ngenxa ye-ambulensi ethatha isikhathi eside ngaphambi kokuba ifike izomlanda.

sot: e le karolo ya mosebetsi oo re tlamehang ho o etsa ka potlako ho ntlafatsa boleng ba tsamaiso ya bophelo bo botle, re phethela taba ya seboka sa moporesidente sa bophelo bo botle, se tla shebisisa dikateng se be se kgobokanye bokgoni ba bohle ba amehang, ho rarolla tlokotsi e ditleliniking le dipetleleng tsa rona.
zul: njengengxenye yomsebenzi okumele siwenze ngokushesha ukuze senze ngcono izinga lohlelo lwezempilo, siphothula umsebenzi wokuhlanganiswa kwemininingwane yesivumelwano esingumphumela wengqungquthela kamongameli yezempilo, esakhelwe phezu kokuqonda okujulile kanye nemibono eyatholakala lapho, futhi okuyisivumelwano esizosebenzisa ongoti abavela kubo bonke ababambiqhaza abasemqoka ukuze kulungiswe izinkinga ezikhona emitholampilo yethu kanye nasezibhedlela.

sot: re se re hatetse pele haholo ka tjhebo botjha ya morero o tebileng wa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha inshorense ya naha ya bophelo bo botle (nhi), ho akga le ho akofisa boleng ba dikgato tsa tlhokomelo ditsing tsa kokelo ya setjhaba, ho aha bokgoni ba basebetsi, ho thewa ha mokgwa wa letlole la nhi, esita le ho bala ditjeo tsa tsamaiso ya letlole la nhi.
zul: mkhulu impela umsebenzi osuwenziwe ekubuyekezweni kohlelo oluqukethe imininingwane ebanzi lokuqaliswa komshwalense kazwelonke wezempilo (i-nhi), kubandakanya ukusheshiswa kwezinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ikhwalithi yosizo nokunakekelwa okutholakala ezikhungweni zikahulumeni, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi lezi zikhungo zinabasebenzi abanele, ukusungulwa kohlaka lwesikhwama se-nhi, kanye nokubala ukuthi kuzodinga imali engakanani ukuphathwa kwesikhwama se-nhi.

sot: re dula re ntse re ngongorehiswa ke sekgahla se nyolohang sa ditshwaetso tsa hiv, haholoholo ho barwetsana, esita le lenane le fokolang la banna ba etsang diteko tsa hiv ba be ba qale ho sebedisa kalafo.
zul: sisalokhu sikhathazekile ngesibalo esikhulayo sabantu abatheleleke ngesandulelangculazi (i-hiv), ikakhulukazi amantombazane nabesifazane abasebasha, futhi sikhathazekile nangesibalo esiphansi kakhulu samadoda ahlolelwa i-hiv bese eqala ukwelashwa uma ethelelekile.

sot: re tla matlafatsa mosebetsi wa rona hore ka 2020 re kenye tshebetsong lewa la 90-90-90 (moo 90% ya batho bohle ba phelang ka hiv ba tla tseba maemo a bona a hiv.
zul: sizowuqinisa umsebenzi esiwenzayo wokuqalisa iqhingasu lama-90-90-90 (okungukuthi, ngowezi-2020, abantu abane-hiv abangama-90% kumele basazi isimo sabo se-hiv, abangama-90% basebenzise imishanguzo yokudambisa i-hiv (ama-arv), futhi kwabangama-90% abadla ama-arv lingabe lisabonakala nakancane igciwane le-hiv) okuhloswe ngalo ukuqeda i-hiv njengobhubhane olubeka engcupheni impilo yomphakathi wonkana, okuyiqhingasu elibandakanya ukwengeza abanye abantu, okungenani abayizigidi ezimbili ngaphambi kukazibandlela wezi-2020, esibalweni sabantu abathola ukwelashwa njengamanje.

sot: moo 90% ya batho bohle ba fumanweng ba na le tshwaetso ya hiv ba tla fumana kalafo ya nako e telele ya di-antiretroviral hape, sekgahla sa vaerase ho 90% ya batho bohle ba fumanang kalafo ya di-antiretroviral se tla theoha haholo) hore re fedise hiv eo e leng tshita bophelong bo botle ba setjhaba, ho akga le ho eketsa lenane la batho ba sebedisang kalafo ka dimilione tse ding hape tse pedi ka tshitwe ya 2020. haeba re tshwanela ho rarolla qholotso ya bohofe ka katleho setjhabeng sohle, re tshwanela ho fana ka boqhetseke re be re thee menyetla ya mesebetsi bakeng sa batho ba holofetseng.
zul: ukuze sikwazi ukunqoba inselelo yobubha kubantu bonke ngokuhlukahlukana kwabo, kumele sihlinzeke ngamakhono futhi sakhe amathuba omsebenzi abhekiswe kubantu abakhubazekile.

sot: ka hona, ke ntho e ngongorehisang haholo ya hore ho na le bana ba holofetseng ba ka bang halofo ya milione ba dilemong tsa ho kena sekolo, empa ha ba kene sekolo.
zul: ngakho-ke kuyinto ekhathazayo kakhulu ukuthi kukhona izingane ezikhubazekile ezilinganiselwa kwisigamu sesigidi okufanele ngabe zisesikoleni, kodwa njengamanje ezingafundi, ezihleli emakhaya.

sot: ho arabeleng diqholotsong tsena, re falliseditse tlhophiso ya dikgato tsa bokowa hore e ye setsiketsing sa mmuso, e leng kantoro ya mopresidente.
zul: ngenhloso yokubhekana nalezi zinselelo, umsebenzi wokuhlelwa nokulawulwa kwezinhlelo eziphathelene nokukhubazeka usufakwe ngaphansi kwehhovisi likamongameli.

sot: re tsosolositse sehlopha sa tshebetso sa moporesidente ho tsa bokowa, mme monongwaha re tla tekela palamente mokgwatsamaiso ditokelong tsa batho ba nang le bokowa aforika, hore o tjhaellwe monwana.
zul: sesilivuselelile ithimba likamongameli elengamele imisebenzi ephathelene nokukhubazeka, futhi kulo nyaka sizothumela ephalamende isivumelwano samalungelo abantu abakhubazekile kwelase-afrika, ukuze siqinisekiswe futhi samukelwe ngokusemthethweni.

sot: ho rarolla mathata a basebetsi ba futsanehileng, moputso wa mathomo wa naha (nmw) o se o na le dikgwedi tse tsheletseng o sebetsa mme tse ntseng di ipetsa di kuma hore, boholo ba dikhamphane di a ikamahanya.
zul: ngenhloso yokuxazulula izinkinga zabantu abasebenzayo abadla imbuya ngothi, sekuphele izinyanga eziyisithupha uqalile ukusebenza umholo ophansi kazwelonke, futhi izinkomba-kusebenza zalesi sikhashana esincane uqalile ukusebenza zibonisa ukuthi izinkampani eziningi ziyawuthobela.

sot: khomishene ya nmw e lebelletswe ho phethela diphuputso tsa sekgahla sa nmw mesebetsing, bohofeng, ho se lekane le ho diphapang tsa meputso ha ho fela loetse 2019. ha re ka ke ra fetola mawa a matlotlo a rona ntle le tsepamiso ya maikutlo e tsepameng hodima kgolo ya moruo.
zul: ikhomishana yomholo ophansi kazwelonke kulindeleke ukuthi iluphothule ngaphambi kokuphela kwenyanga kamandulo 2019 ucwaningo mayelana nomthelela womholo ophansi kazwelonke ekuqashweni kwabantu, ububha, ukungalingani kanye nokuhluka kwemiholo.

sot: nakong ya dilemo tse leshome tse tlang, ke tabatabelo ya rona hore moruo wa rona o hole ka sekgahla se seholoholo ho feta sa kgolo ya setjhaba sa rona.
zul: ngeke neze sikwazi ukuguqula isimo sezwe uma singagxili kakhulu ekukhulisweni komnotho.

sot: ke ha feela re fihlella dikgahleng tse hodimo tsa kgolo moo re tla kgona ho lokisa tshenyo e entsweng moruong ka nako e fetileng.
zul: kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umnotho ukhula ngesivinini esingaphezulu kakhulu kwesivinini sokukhula kwesibalo sabantu ezweni.

sot: re etsa polelo ena mothating oo sebopeho sa moruo se fokolang ka ho fetisisa.
zul: futhi uma sesifinyelele emazingeni aphakeme okukhula komnotho ngokuqhubekayo yilapho-ke siyokwazi ukuguqula umonakalo wezomnotho owenzeke kuleli esikhathini esedlule.

sot: kamora ho qepha ha kgolo sehleng sa pele, banka ya risefe jwale e hakanya hore kgolo ya 2019 e ka nna ya eba katlase ho moo e neng e lebelletswe ka teng ditekanyetsong tsa ditjhelete tsa hlakola.
zul: sikusho lokhu esikhathini lapho izibikezelo zesimo somnotho zibonisa isimo esibuthakathaka kakhulu.

sot: lebaka le leng la tshebetso e monyebe ya moruo e bile ya ho tima ha motlakase pejana monongwaha, hammoho le ho tswela pele ha tlhokeho ya botsitso phepelong ya motlakase, le maemo a eskom.
zul: kulandela ukwehla nokuncipha kakhulu komnotho ngekota yokuqala yonyaka, manje ibhangengodla selibikezela ukuthi ngowezi-2019 umnotho kungenzeka ukhule ngezinga elingaphansi kwalelo elashiwo kwisabelomali esethulwa ngonhlolanja.

sot: mona thuto e totobetse: bakeng sa kgolo, re hloka phepelo ya motlakase e tshepahalang ebile e le e tsitsitseng.
zul: esinye sezizathu ezabangela ukufadalala komnotho wumthelela wokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, kuhlangene nongabazane olulokhu luqhubeke njalo mayelana nokuphakelwa kukagesi kanye nesimo sezinto ebesingesihle kwa-eskom.

sot: eskom e tobane le pharela ho tsa ditjhelete, tshebetso le sebopeho sa yona.
zul: isifundo esisithola kulokhu sicace bha: ukuze sikwazi ukukhulisa umnotho, sidinga ukuphakelwa kukagesi okuqhubekayo, ngaso sonke isikhathi, futhi ngendlela esimeme.

sot: haesale ho tloha nakong ya ho tima ha motlakase pejana monongwaha, eskom e se e entse kgatelopele e bonahalang ya ho kenya tshebetsong morero wa yona wa dikgato tse robong, o netefatsang poloko e ntlenyana ya letoto la metjhine ya yona e fehlang motlakase, phokotso ya ditjeo le ho netefatsa boteng ba dipolokelo tsa mashala a lekaneng.
zul: u-eskom ubhekene nezinkinga ezinkulu kwezezimali, ekuqhutshweni komsebenzi kanye nesimo sonkana ngaphakathi enkampanini.

sot: ho ya ka dikgothaletso tsa setlamo sa tshebetso ya botsitso sa eskom le setlamo sa tlhophobotjha ya setekgeniki, eskom e jalajala basebetsi ba yona ba nang le boqhetseke le malebela ka ho fetisisa, moo ba hlokehang ka ho fetisisa.
zul: emva kokumiswa kohlelo lokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga ngasekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, u-eskom usenze inqubekelaphambili enkulu impela ekuqalisweni kohlelo olunamaphuzu ayisishiyagalolunye, ekuqinisekiseni ukulungiswa nokugcinwa kweziphehla-mandla za-eskom zisebenza kahle, ekuncishisweni kwezindleko kanye nasekuqinisekiseni ukuthi kunamalahle agciniwe anele.

sot: ka boitlamo ba thuso ya ditjhelete bo entsweng ke mmuso, bo talotsweng ditekanyetsong tsa ditjhelete tsa 2019, eskom e na le tjhelete e lekaneng ya ho phetha mosebetsi wa yona ho fihlela mafelong a mphalane.
zul: ngokuhambisana nezincomo zethimba elengamele umsebenzi wokuqinisekisa ukusimama kuka-eskom kanjalo nethimba lokubuyekeza umsebenzi ka-eskom, u-eskom uzothumela labo basebenzi bakhe abanekhono kanye nolwazi lomsebenzi olunzulu namava ezindaweni lapho bedingeka khona kakhulu.

sot: ha eskom e ka salla morao ka dikadimo tsa yona, seo se tla baka ho tota ha mekitlane ya yona e so lefshwe ebile e tla thefula haholo kotla e se ntse e dutla.
zul: isimo sezimali sale nkampani siyinto elokhu iqhubeke njalo nokudala ukukhathazeka okukhulu.

sot: kahoo, re tla tshwanela ho rarolla taba ena ka ho teka bili e qollehileng ya tjhelete e ka thoko, e le ka potlako, ho aba karolo e tomanyana ya r230 bilione e le tshehetso ya ditjhelete tseo eskom e tla di hloka dilemong tsena tsa pele tsa dilemo tse 10 tse tlang.
zul: njengoba kukhona isamba semali ebekwe eceleni esivela kuhulumeni esamenyezelwa kwisabelomali sowezi-2019, u-eskom unemali eyanele ezokwenza akwazi ukuqhuba imisebenzi yakhe kanye nokukhokhela izikweletu kuze kube sekupheleni kukamfumfu 2019. uma u-eskom engahluleka ukukhokha imali ethile abolekwe yona lokho kungaholela ekutheni athathwe njengenkampani ehlulekile ukukhokhela zonke ezinye izikweletu zakhe futhi lokho kungaba nomthelela omkhulukazi emgodlagodleni wezimali zikahulumeni, kakade obhekene nesimo sokuntuleka nokushoda kwezimali.

sot: sena re tlameha ho se etsa, hobane eskom e bohlokwa haholo moruong wa rona hore e ka tlohellwa hore e putlame.
zul: ngakho-ke, kumele sizame ukugwema le nkinga ngokuthi sethule ngokushesha umthethosivivinywa wesabelomali esikhethekile ukuze sinike u-eskom, eminyakeni yokuqala, ingxenye enkulu yalesi samba samabhiliyoni angama-230 amarandi oxhasomali azoludinga eminyakeni eyi-10 ezayo.

sot: eskom ke boikarabelo ba rona bohle re le setjhaba mme re tlameha ho netefatsa hore re a e tshehetsa.
zul: lokhu sizokwenza ngoba phela u-eskom ubaluleke kakhulu emnothweni wezwe, ukuthi singavele simyeke nje afadalale, ahluleke nokwenza umsebenzi wakhe.

sot: dintlha tse ding di tla fumanwa ho letona la tsa ditjhelete kgabareng.
zul: eminye imininingwane ephathelene nalokhu izohlinzekwa ngungqongqoshe wezezimali ngokuhamba kwesikhathi.

sot: re tla tsebisa ka ho hirwa ha mohlanka e moholo wa phethahatso, kamora ho itokolla ha monghadi phakamani hadebe.
zul: sizomemezela ukuqashwa komphathi omkhulu (i-ceo) omusha kulandela ukwesula emsebenzini kukamnu phakamani hadebe.

sot: o kene ka nako e boima ho eskom mme o entse boholo mmoho le boto e etelletsweng pele ke monghadi jabu mabuza, ho tsitsisa khamphane.
zul: wathatha izintambo ngesikhathi esinzima kakhulu kwa-eskom futhi mkhulu umsebenzi awenzile ukuletha uzinzo kule nkampani, ebambisene nebhodi lakwa-eskom eliholwa ngumnu jabu mabuza.

sot: hape, haufinyane re tla be re hira mohlanka e moholo wa tlhophobotjha, ya tla lebellwa hore a busetse eskom botsitsong ba tsa ditjhelete a tsepamisitse maikutlo motswakong o dipakeng tsa sebopeho sa pokello ya ditjhelete, mekitlaneng le ditjeong tsa khamphane.
zul: khona maduze nje sizoqasha isikhulu esiyinhloko yokuhlelwa kabusha kwenkampani, okulindeleke ukuthi siguqule futhi siphucule isimo sezimali sakwa-eskom ngokuthi sicubungule ngokucophelela okukhulu uhlaka lwesimo sengeniso-mali, izikweletu kanye nezindleko zale nkampani.

sot: eskom e boetse e sebetsa le mmuso le ba bang ba amehang, ho rarolla taba ya morero o batsi wa sebopeho sa yona esita le mokitlane wa yona ka kakaretso, hammoho le mokitlane o kolotwang ke bomasepala le basebedisi ka bomong.
zul: futhi u-eskom usebenzisana nohulumeni kanye nabanye ababambiqhaza ukuze kubhekisiswe indlela eyakheke ngayo le nkampani, kanye nezikweletu zonke zenkampani kanjalo nemali ekweletwa ngomasipala kanye nabo bonke abanye abasebenzisi bakagesi kule nkampani.

sot: re le naha, re tlameha ho thasisetsa taba ya hore bao ba sebedisang motlakase ba tlameha ho o lefella.
zul: njengezwe, kumele siwugcizelele umgomo wokuthi labo abasebenzisa ugesi kumele bawukhokhele.

sot: ho hloleha ho lefa ho thefula phepelo yohle ya motlakase, moruo wa rona le matsapa a rona a ho thea mesebetsi.
zul: ukungawukhokheli ugesi kubeka engcupheni uhlelo lonkana lokuphakelwa kukagesi, futhi kubeka engcupheni nomnotho wezwe, kuphazamise nemizamo yethu yokwakha amathuba omsebenzi.

sot: matsatsi a matsholo a ho hana ho lefa a fedile.
zul: sezadlula izinsuku zokuduba kanye nokwenqaba ukukhokha.

sot: ena jwale ke nako ya ho aha, ke nako ya hore rona bohle re kenye letsoho.
zul: manje sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sakhe, sekuyisikhathi sokuthi sonke sifake isandla.

sot: kahoo, re etsa kgoeletso bathong bohle ba habo rona ba sebedisang motlakase hore ba lefe, ho etsetsa hore eskom e kgone ho fana ka ditshebeletso.
zul: ngakho-ke, siyabanxusa bonke abantu bakithi abasebenzisa ugesi ukuthi bawukhokhele, ukuze u-eskom akwazi ukuqhuba umsebenzi wakhe wokuphakela izwe ngogesi.

sot: maaforika borwa a heso,ho fihlella dipeelo tsa rona tsa kgolo, re tla aha botjha metheo ya moruo wa rona ka ho tsosolosa le ho atolla makala a tlhahiso.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukuhlangabezana nemigomo yokukhulisa umnotho esizibekele yona, sizokwakha kabusha izisekelo zomnotho wethu ngokuvuselela nokwelula imikhakha yethu ekhiqizayo.

sot: sena se hloka hore re nahane botjha ka lewa la diindasteri tsa rona, ka ho utolla botsetedi ba poraefete le ho kenya morolo pusong, e le ho matlafatsa kenyeletso ya bohle moruong.
zul: lokhu kudinga ukuthi siqhamuke nendlela ehlukile yokwakha kabusha iqhingasu lethu lezimboni, sigqugquzele ngamandla utshalomali oluvela emkhakheni ozimele futhi sifake umdlandla embusweni ukuze sikhuthaze ukubandakanywa komuntu wonke emnothweni.

sot: ho hlokeha hore puso e etse seabo sa yona ka bokgabane e le mothusi ya fanang ka ditshebeletso tsa mantlha le meralo ya motheo ya bohlokwa, molaodi ya beang melawana e theang menyetla e lekanang ya bohle ba amehang, ebile e le moabi ya netefatsang hore boholo ba bao ba tlokotsing setjhabeng, ba a tshireletswa ba be ba fuwe monyetla wa ho ipabola kahohlehohle maphelong a bona.
zul: lokhu kudinga futhi ukuthi umbuso udlale indima yawo ngendlela efanele njengomvuli wamathuba nomphumelelisi wezinto ohlinzeka ngezidingongqangi kanye nengqalasizinda esemqoka, umlawuli oshaya imithetho eyakha futhi ivule amathuba ngokulinganayo kubo bonke ababambiqhaza, futhi njengomabi wezinto kabusha oqinisekisayo ukuthi bavikelekile futhi bayabhekelelwa labo ababuthakathaka futhi abasengcupheni ngoba bengakwazi ukuzinakekela kahle ngokwabo, abanikeze amathuba futhi abahlomise ukuze nabo bakwazi ukubonisa amakhono abo ngokuphelele futhi baphile impilo abayifunayo.

sot: ho na le seabo se seng seo re batlang hore puso e se etse, seo ke seabo sa dikgwebo.
zul: kunenye futhi indima esifuna ukuthi idlalwe ngumbuso, okuyindima ephathelene nokuvulwa kwamabhizinisi.

sot: seabo seo ho sona puso e kgonang ho nka dikgato tse thatanyana e le ho thusa moruo hore o hole.
zul: indima lapho umbuso ukwazi ukwenza izinto ezingaba wusizo olukhulu nakuba zinobungozi nobungcuphe obuthile, futhi ngalokho-ke alekelele umnotho ukuthi ukhule.

sot: re tla fana ka menyetla e ka sehloohong makaleng a moruo a nang le bokgoni bo boholo ba kgolo.
zul: sizogxila kakhudlwana futhi sibeke eqhulwini leyo mikhakha yomnotho ebonisa amathuba aphakeme okukhula.

sot: ha re lekola dikatleho tse lekaleng la makoloi, re tla kenya tshebetsong merero e meholo e theilweng, re le mmoho le dikgwebo le bosebetsi diindastering tse kang tsa makala a diaparo le masela, gase, dikhemikhale le dipolasteke, dintjhafatsuwa, esita le a ho kgobokanngwa ha ditshepe.
zul: ngokusebenzela phezu kwempumelelo esiyizuzile emkhakheni wezimoto, sizoqalisa izinhlelo-ngqangi ezenziwe ngokubambisana nabamabhizinisi kanye nabasebenzi ezimbonini ezinjengemboni yomkhakha wezingubo zokugqoka, owendwangu, owegesi yemvelo, owamakhemikhali nemikhiqizo kacwazi, owemikhiqizo evuselelekayo, kanye nowokukhiqizwa kwensimbi nemikhiqizo esansimbi.

sot: re tla atolla haholwanyane lekala la temo le dihlahiswa tsa temo, ka ho tshehetsa mefuta ya boleng ya keketso e ka sehloohong le dihlahiswa, re thee mebaraka e metjha re be re fokotse ho tshepela ha rona dihlahisweng tsa temothuo tsa ditswantle.
zul: sizowukhulisa futhi siwunwebe kakhulu umkhakha wezolimo nokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo ngokuthi sisekele uchungechunge lokukhiqizwa kanye nokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo, sibheke amazwe nezindawo ezintsha esizothengisa kuzona imikhiqizo yethu futhi sinciphise ukuthembela kwethu emikhiqizweni yezolimo evela emazweni angaphandle.

sot: re tla matlafatsa diindasteri tsa merafo ka ho thea mebaraka ya dirafshwa tsa aforika borwa re shebile ho betlwa ha dirafshwa tse itseng, ditjeo tse fokoditsweng tsa dikabelo, esita le diphuputso le dintshetsopele tse ekeditsweng.
zul: sizoyiqinisa futhi siyeseke imboni yezimayini ngokuthi sibheke amazwe nezindawo okuzothengiswa kuzona izimbiwa zaseningizimu afrika, ngokuthi silungise imikhiqizo yezimbiwa ethile, okuzokwenza ukuthi ikhuphuke ikhwalithi ngokunjalo nenanintengo laleyo mikhiqizo, sinciphise izindleko zokukhiqiza izimbiwa futhi sikhuphule nocwaningo kanye nokuthuthukiswa.

sot: ka bokenadipakeng ho tsa sepakapakeng jwaloka mabatowa a kgethehileng a moruo, tsosoloso ya mapatlelo a diindasteri tsa lehae, ditsi tsa kgwebo, ditsi tsa dijithale le dikgwebo tsa makeisheneng le mahaeng, re tla tlisa dintshetsopele tsa moruo dibakeng tsa lehae.
zul: ngokusebenzisa izinhlelo zokuhlinzeka ngendawo yokuqhuba ibhizinisi, njengezizinda zomnotho ezikhethekile, ukuvuselelwa kwamapaki ezimboni endawo, izizinda zebhizinisi, izizinda zobuxhakaxhaka nobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye namabhizinisi asemalokishini kanye nawasezindaweni ezisemakhaya, sizoletha intuthuko yezomnotho eduze kwezindawo okuhlala kuzona abantu.

sot: re tla boela re tsepamisa maikutlo dikgwebong tse nyenyane le tse mahareng ditoropong tse kgolo, makeisheneng le dibakeng tsa mahaeng re be re ahe dibaka tsa mebaraka moo ba tla hwebisana ka dihlahiswa tsa bona.
zul: sizogxila emabhizinisini asafufusa emadolobheni ethu, emalokishini kanye nasezindaweni ezisemakhaya futhi sakhe nezindawo zemakethe yokuhweba lapho osomabhizinisi bezothengisa khona imikhiqizo yabo.

sot: re tla ntlafatsa tabatabelo ya rona ya ho menahanya dikgoro tsa ho kena ha bahahlaudi ba matjhabatjhaba, ho ya ho 21 milione ka 2030. sena se tla fihlellwa ka ntjhafatso ya letshwao la naha la boitsebahatso, ho hlahiswa ha taolo e tswileng matsoho ya visa esita le tjhadimo e matla mebarakeng ya china le india, le ho fihla ha difofane tse tswang hohle khontinenteng ya rona.
zul: sizoyifezekisa inhloso nesifiso sethu sokukhulisa ngokuphindwe kabili inani lezivakashi zakwamanye amazwe ezivakashela kuleli, liyifinyelele ezigidini ezingama-21 ngaphambi kowezi-2030.

sot: re ikemiseditse ho netefatsa hore bahahlaudi ba hahlaulelang naheng ya rona ba a bolokeha.
zul: lokhu sizokwenza ngokuthi sivuselele isasasa lokuvakashela kuleli lizwe futhi senze leli lizwe libe yizwe elihehayo, sethule inqubo yokukhishwa kwezimvume zokungena nokuvakashela kuleli (ama-visa) ezisezingeni lomhlaba, futhi sigxile ikakhulukazi ekuheheni abavakashi abavela kwelase-china kanye nase-india, ngokunjalo nezivakashi ezifika kuleli ngendiza, ezivela emazweni aleli zwekazi lethu, i-afrika.

sot: re tla atolla diindasteri tsa rona tsa theknoloji ya maemo a hodimo ka ho netefatsa hore moralo wa molao le wa taolo o bapatsa bosibolli, o phahamisa ntshetsopele ya boqhetseke bakeng sa batjha ditheknolojing tse ntjha, ebile e fokotsa ditjeo tsa deitha.
zul: sizoyikhulisa imboni yezobuchwepheshe nobuxhakaxhaka besimanjemanje ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuthi imithetho kanye nemithethonqubo elawulayo igqugquzela ukuqanjwa kwezinto ezintsha, sithuthukise amakhono abantu abasha kwezobuchwepheshe obusha, futhi sinciphise nezindleko ze-data.

sot: kae kapa kae moo re neng re ile teng, haesale batjha ba ntse ba lla ka taba ya ditjeo tse hodimo haholo tsa deitha aforika borwa.
zul: nomaphi lapho besihamba khona, abantu abasha bebelokhu bekhalaza ngenkinga yezindleko ze-data eziphakeme kakhulu eningizimu afrika.

sot: ho fana ka morolonyana mosebetsing ona, nakong ya kgwedi e tlang, letona la dikgokahanyo le tla ntsha tataiso ya leano ho lekgotla le ikemetseng la dikgokahanyo la aforika borwa (icasa), ho thakgola mosebetsi wa ho ntshuwa ha lethathama la dilaesense.
zul: ukuze sifake umfutho kule nqubo, kule nyanga ezayo, ungqongqoshe wezokuxhumana uzokhipha umyalelo oqondiswe ophikweni oluzimele lwezokuxhumana lwaseningizimu afrika (i-icasa) ukuthi luqalise inqubo yokuhlinzekwa kwamalayisensi omthamo wamagagasi okusakaza nokuthunyelwa kolwazi ngomoya.

sot: mosebetsi ona o tla kenyeletsa mekgwa ya ho phahamisa tlhodisano, phetoho, kgolo ya lekala e kenyeletsang bohle, esita le phihlello lefatsheng lohle.
zul: le nqubo izobandakanya izinyathelo zokukhuthaza ukuncintisana, uguquko, ukukhuliswa kwalo mkhakha ngendlela ebandakanya umuntu wonke kanye nokuqinisekisa ukufinyelela kwabantu bonke.

sot: ena ke karolo ya bohlokwa ya ho theola ditjeo tsa deitha, mme e a hlokeha bakeng sa ntshetsopele ya moruo le ho utolla menyetla ya batjha.
zul: lokhu kuyingxenye esemqoka ekwehliseni izindleko ze-data, okuyinto ebaluleke kakhulu ekuthuthukisweni komnotho kanjalo nasekuvulweni kwamathuba aqondiswe entsheni.

sot: re etsa kgoeletso diindastering tsa dikgokahanyo tsa mehala hore di theole ditjeo tsa deitha le ho feta, ho etsetsa hore di tsamaisane le ditheko tsa dinaha tse ding lefatsheng.
zul: siyayinxusa imboni yengqalasizinda yezokuxhumana ukuthi iphinde izehlise futhi izindleko ze-data ukuze inanintengo le-data lilingane nelamanye amazwe omhlaba.

sot: re matlafatsa thahasello ya rona ya botsetedi.
zul: siyawuqinisa impela umkhankaso wethu wokuheha utshalomali.

sot: ho r300 bilione ya matsete e tsebisitsweng tlhomamisong ya rona ya seboka sa botsetedi ngwahola, diprojeke tsa boleng bo kahodimonyana ho r250 bilione di se di kene mokgahlelong wa ho kenngwa tshebetsong.
zul: kutshalomali olungamabhiliyoni angama-300 amarandi olwamenyezelwa kwingqungquthela yotshalomali yokuqala ngqa eyabanjwa ngonyaka odlule, kunemiklamo esiqalisiwe yenani elingaphezulu nje kancane kwamabhiliyoni angama-250 amarandi.

sot: re tswela pele ho aha lethathama la matsete, le tla bapatswa sebokeng sa bobedi sa botsetedi aforika borwa, se tla tshwarwa ho tloha ka la 5 ho isa ho la 7 pudungwana monongwaha.
zul: siyaqhubeka nokwakha umgudu wotshalomali olungenayo kuleli, futhi lokhu kuzoboniswa kwingqungquthela yesibili yotshalomali yaseningizimu afrika ezobanjwa kusukela mhla ziyisi-5 kuze kube ngumhla ziyisi-7 kulwezi.

sot: nakong ya diqeaqeo, mosebetsi wa maqosa a botsetedi o ahile dikamano tsa bohlokwa dipakeng tsa mmuso le lepatlelo la bahwebi.
zul: esikhathini lapho sibhekene nongabazane, umsebenzi wamanxusa otshalomali sewuvule amaxhama okuxhumana nokusebenzisana asemqoka kakhulu phakathi kukahulumeni namabhizinisi.

sot: ho ya ka ditlaleho tsa bona, ho hlakile hore di ngata dintho tse ntseng di tshwanela ho etsuwa ho ntlafatsa maemo a botsetedi.
zul: uma sibheka imbuyisambiko esiyithole kubona, kuyacaca ukuthi kusekuningi okusamele kwenziwe ngenhloso yokwenza ngcono isimo okusetshenzelwa ngaphansi kwaso esiphathelene nokutshalwa kwezimali.

sot: tsena di akga tlhophobotjha ya mokgwa oo mmuso o hlophisang ka teng mosebetsi wa ho rarolla diqholotso tseo batsetedi ba tobaneng le tsona, esita le ho fetola leano le kaho ya phahamiso ya botsetedi ba rona.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukubuyekezwa kwendlela olawula ngayo umsebenzi wokuxazulula izinselelo abahlangabezana nazo abatshalizimali kanye nokuphucula nokuhlela kabusha inqubomgomo yokukhuthaza utshalomali kanye nohlaka lwesakhiwo sayo.

sot: kgatelopele e ntle e se e entswe ka kgato ya kgolo ya setjhaba le poraefete, e leleketsweng ke letona nkosazana dlamini-zuma, monghadi roelf meyer le ngaka johan van zyl slabbert.
zul: mkhulu umsebenzi esesiwenzile ngaphansi kohlelo lokukhulisa umnotho ngobambiswano phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele oluholwa ngungqongqoshe unkosazana dlamini-zuma, umnu roelf meyer kanye nodkt johan van zyl slabbert.

sot: lekala la poraefete le ikitlaeditse ho tsetela r840 bilione diprojekeng tse 43 makaleng a kahodimo ho 19, esita le ho theeng mesebetsi e 155 000 dilemong tse hlano tse tlang.
zul: umkhakha ozimele usuthembise ukutshala imali engamabhiliyoni angama-840 amarandi emiklamweni engama-43 ngaphansi kwemikhakha eyi-19, futhi lokho kuzodala amathuba omsebenzi ayizi-155 000 kule minyaka emihlanu ezayo.

sot: dipuisanong le ba kgwebo, mmuso o ikitlaeditse ho tlosa ditshita tsa leano o be o akofise ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha diprojeke tsena.
zul: ezingxoxweni ebezibanjwe nabamabhizinisi, uhulumeni usezwakalise ukuzibophezela ekususeni izithiyo nemigoqo ephathelene nezinqubomgomo nemithetho eyinkimbinkimbi futhi asheshise ukuqaliswa kwale miklamo.

sot: re tlola matjato mme re sebeletsa sete ya diphetoho tse ka sehloohong e le ho ntlafatsa manolo a ho etsa kgwebo ka ho momahanya le ho hlopha botjha mesebetsi ya taolo, ho fetola tumello esita le dikopo tse ding, le ho fokotsa ditjeo tsa boikamahanyo.
zul: senza imizamo esheshayo yokuletha izinguquko ezisemqoka okuhloswe ngazo ukwenza kube lula ukwenza ibhizinisi kuleli, ngokuthi sihlanganise futhi sihlele kabusha imithethonqubo elawulayo, senze kube kula kakhulu ukuthola izimvume nokufaka izicelo ngobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje, futhi kuncishiswe nezindleko zokuthotshelwa kwenzinqubo ezibekiwe.

sot: meralo ya motheo ke karolo ya bohlokwa ya botsetedi e tshehetsang phetoho ya sebopeho, kgolo le tlhahiso ya mesebetsi.
zul: ingqalasizinda ingumkhakha osemqoka kakhulu okumele kutshalwe kuwona izimali, osekela ukulethwa koguquko ezikhungweni, ukukhula komnotho kanye nokuvulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

sot: ho bohlokwa tsosolosong ya moruo wa rona, ho fana ka moelelo le sephetho sehleng sa rona se setjha.
zul: ingqalasiizinda ibaluleke kakhulu futhi ekuvuselelweni komnotho wezwe, kanye nokuletha nokuqalisa isikhathi esisha sokuvuselela nokuthuthukisa izwe lethu.

sot: mokgwa wa rona o motjha wa ho etsa dintho kahong ya meralo ya motheo, o itshetlehile dilekaneng tse matla dipakeng tsa makala a setjhaba le a poraefete, esita le dibaka tsa lehae.
zul: indlela entsha esizoyilandela ekuthuthukisweni kwengqalasizinda isekelwe phezu kobambiswano oluqinile phakathi kukahulumeni nomkhakha ozimele, kanye nemiphakathi yendawo.

sot: o akga lethathama le qollehileng la mehato ya tsa ditjhelete le ya ditheo ho matlafatsa dikaho le ho bea ka sehloohong taba ya meralo ya motheo ya metsi, mebila le bodulo ba baithuti, ka tshebediso e ntlenyana ya tjhelete e lekanyeditsweng.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya inhlanganisela ekhethekile yezinyathelo eziphathelene nezimali kanye nalezo eziphathelene nokuphatha nokulawula okuhloswe ngazo ukukhuthaza umsebenzi wokwakha kanye nokubeka eqhulwini ukwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda yamanzi, imigwaqo kanye nezindlu zokuhlalisa abafundi, ngokuthi kusetshenziswe ngobunyoninco leyo mali eyabelwe le miklamo.

sot: jwalokaha ho tsebisitswe ho sona e fetileng, mmuso o beelletse ka thoko r100 bilione ho tshehetsa letlole la meralo ya motheo.
zul: njengoba kwamenyezelwa kwi-sona edlule, uhulumeni ubeke eceleni isamba esingamabhiliyoni ayi-100 amarandi ngenhloso yokuxhasa nokugqugquzela isikhwama sengqalasizinda.

sot: re sebeletsa hore letlole lena e be la setheo, le tla laolwa ke banka ya ntshetsopele ya aforika e ka borwa, le lefapha le sa tswa botjwa la mesebetsi ya setjhaba le meralo ya motheo le tla ba le seabo sa tekolo.
zul: senza imizamo yokuthi lesi sikhwama sibe yisikhungo, esizolawulwa yibhange lentuthuko laseningizimu afrika (i-dbsa), futhi umnyango wezemisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nengqalasizinda ohlelwe kabusha yiwona ozoqapha umsebenzi owenziwa yilesi sikhungo.

sot: re nnile ra etsa sena ka dipuisano le batsetedi ba poraefete, ba kang matlole a dipenshene, ba nang le tjhatjheho ya ho kenya letsoho letloleng la meralo ya motheo.
zul: lokhu sikwenza ngokubonisana kanye nokubambisana nabatshalizimali abazimele, abafana nezikhungo ezilawula izikhwama zempesheni, ezingabatshalizimali abanentshisekelo ekubambeni iqhaza esikhwameni sengqalasizinda.

sot: ditlhabollo tsena di tla netefatsa hore ho ba le merero e betere ya ho etsa diprojeke tsa meralo ya motheo, mosebetsi o thata wa kgonahalo le tlhophiso, botsamaisi ba lewa le ntlafaditsweng, ho kenngwa tshebetsong ho se nang diphoso le puso e ntlenyana.
zul: lezi zinguquko zizoqinisekisa ukuhlelwa kangcono kwemiklamo yengqalasizinda, umsebenzi onohlonze wokuhlola ukuthi ingqalasizinda izokwenzeka ngempumelelo yini nokwenza amalungiselelo afanelekile, ukuphucula ukuphatha okukhethekile, ukuqaliswa ngobunyoninco kwemisebenzi yengqalasizinda kanye nokuphatha okuhle.

sot: sena se tla fana ka matlafatso e hlokehang haholo lekaleng la dikonteraka le bileng maqakabetsing ka nako e teletsana.
zul: lokhu kuhlinzekwa ngokwesekwa okudingeka kakhulu emkhakheni wezokwakha osekuphele isikhathi eside impela ufadalele.

sot: re tla hlokola tlhokeho e kgolo ya dihlahiswa tsa kwano lapeng, re be re hodise tlhahiso ya aforika borwa ka ho netefatsa hore letsholo la ‘reka kwano lapeng’ le hohle ebile ke motjhaotjhele.
zul: sizogqugquzela futhi sikhuthaze abantu ukuthi bathenge imikhiqizo nezimpahla ezikhiqizwe kuleli futhi sikhulise umkhakha wezokukhiqiza waseningizimu afrika ngokuthi siqinisekise ukuthi umkhankaso ‘wokuthengwa kwezimpahla ezikhiqizwe kuleli’ (i-‘buy local’) ungundabuzekwayo futhi ubonakala yonke indawo.

sot: re etsa kgoeletso ho maaforika borwa ohle hore kgafetsakgafetsa ebile e le ka boomo, ba reke thepa e hlahisitsweng kwano lapeng.
zul: siyabanxusa bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi, ngenhloso futhi ngokuqhubekayo, bathenge izimpahla ezakhiwe kuleli.

sot: sutu, hempe le sekgama tsena tseo ke di apereng kajeno, di entswe hona kwano lapeng ke basebetsi ba tsa masela ba aforika borwa lebenkeleng la house of monatic le kwano salt river motse kapa.
zul: le sudu nehembe kanye nothayi engikugqokile namhlanje kwakhiwe ngabasebenzi bemboni yendwangu yaseningizimu afrika e-house of monatic, khona lapha e-salt river edolobheni lasekapa.

sot: bohle ha re rekeng dihlahiswa tse entsweng kwano lapeng ho phahamisa tlhokeho e kgolo ya thepa moruong wa rona.
zul: sonke masithenge izimpahla ezakhiwe kuleli ukuze sikhulise isibalo sabantu abathenga impahla ekhiqizwe kuleli.

sot: nakong ena ya selemo se tlang, re habile ho phethela ditumellano le ba mabenkele hore ba kenye thepa e tomanyana ya aforika borwa mabenkeleng a bona, ba be ba bapatse dihlahiswa tse kgabane tse entsweng ke basebetsi aforika borwa.
zul: kulo nyaka esiwuphethe, sifuna ukwenza izivumelwano nezitolo ezithengisa impahla ukuthi ziqinisekise ukuthi zithenga izimpahla ezikhiqizwe eningizimu afrika futhi ziyikhangise ngenkuthalo imikhiqizo emihle kakhulu eyakhiwe ngabasebenzi baseningizimu afrika.

sot: ka mokgwa o tshwanang, re tla bapatsa dihlahiswa tsa rona haholwanyane khontinenteng ya aforika esita le lefatsheng lohle.
zul: futhi kusenjalo sizokhangisa ngomdlandla omkhulu imikhiqizo yethu ezwekazini lase-afrika kanye nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

sot: mehato ena e tsheheditswe ke boikitlaetso ba rona bo matla moralong wa leano la sekepele sa moruo le tsa ditjhelete se tla tswela pele ho matlafatsa boitshepo le botsetedi.
zul: lezi zinyathelo zisekelwe phezu kwesibophezelo sethu esiqinile kwinqubomgomo yomnotho-jikelele kanye neyezezimali ezoqhubeka nokukhuthaza ukwethenjwa kwaleli lizwe futhi kukhuthaze nokutshalwa kwezimali.

sot: re ikemiseditse ho ba sedi ka bolaodi ba ho kadima le ho itlama mala masesane tshebedisong ya ditjhelete, e le ho tsitsisa ditjhelete tsa setjhaba sa rona le ho fokotsa qaka ya mekitlane.
zul: sizibophezele ekubolekeni izimali ngobuhlakani obukhulu ukuze singaboleki imali engaphezu kwamandla ethu okukhokha leyo mali esiyibolekile futhi sizibophezele ekusebenziseni imali ngokucophelela okukhulu ukuze siqinisekise uzinzo ezimalini zikahulumeni futhi sinciphise nesikweletu sezwe.

sot: banka ya risefe ya aforika borwa ke setheo sa bohlokwa pusong ya rona ya demokrasi, mme e tshepahala haholo ebile e boemong bo botle naheng ena esita le matjhabeng.
zul: ibhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika lisiyikhungo esisemqoka kakhulu ezweni lethu elibuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, esithenjwayo futhi esihlonishwa kakhulu kuleli nasemhlabeni wonke jikelele.

sot: botsitso ba ditheko ke ntho e hlokehang, leha ho le jwalo, ha ho a lekana bakeng sa kgolo ya moruo.
zul: uzinzo lwamananintengo luyadingeka impela, kepha-ke alwanele ekuqinisekiseni ukukhula komnotho.

sot: ditheko tse nyolohang tsa dihlahiswa le ditshebeletso di sithabetsa matla a ho reka a maaforika borwa ohle, haholoholo a bahloki.
zul: amananintengo ezimpahla nezinsizakalo adlondlobalayo anciphisa amandla okuthenga abo bonke abantu baseningzimu afrika, ikakhulukazi labo abadla imbuya ngothi.

sot: infleishene e boela e nyotobetsa tlhodisano ya difeme tsa rona tse qothisanang lehlokwa ka diyantle le ditswantle, mme e bea diindasteri le mesebetsi tlokotsing.
zul: ukwehla kwamandla emali kunciphisa amandla okuncintisana ezimpahla zakuleli ezithunyelwa emazweni angaphandle kanye namafemu akuleli akhiqiza izimpahla ezincintisana nezimpahla ezingena kuleli ezakhiwe kwamanye amazwe, futhi lokhu kubeka engcupheni izimboni zakuleli kanye nemisebenzi.

sot: ka mabaka ana, molaotheo wa rona o roma banka ya risefe ya aforika borwa ho tshireletsa boleng ba matla a tjhelete ya rona, molemong wa kgolo e tsitsitseng ebile e le ya nako e telele.
zul: ngenxa yalesi sizathu-ke, umthethosisekelo wethu ugunyaza ibhange lombuso laseningizimu afrika ukuthi livikele isilinganisontengo semali yakuleli ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukukhula komnotho okulingene futhi okusimeme.

sot: kajeno, re thasisetsa thomo ena ya molaotheo wa rona, eo banka ya risefe e tlamehang ho e ntshetsa pele ka boikemelo, ntle le tshabo, lereko kapa ho kgetha nku ka pere.
zul: namuhla, sithanda ukuligcizelela leli gunya elihlinzekwe ngokomthethosisekelo, okumele lifezekiswe yibhange lombuso ngokuzimela, ngaphandle kokuchema noma ukucwasa.

sot: molaotheo wa rona o boela o hloka hore ho be le dipuisano kgafetsa dipakeng tsa banka ya risefe le letona la tsa ditjhelete ho bapatsa tlhophiso ya sekepele sa moruo, mme tseo tsohle di etsuwa molemong wa tlhahiso ya mesebetsi le kgolo ya moruo.
zul: umthethosisekelo wethu uyalela futhi ukuthi kube nokubonisana okuqhubekayo phakathi kwebhangengodla kanye nongqongqoshe wezezimali ukuze kugqugquzelwe ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo emnothweni wezwe wonkana, ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokukhulisa umnotho.

sot: haeba re batla ho qothisana lehlokwa boemong ba matjhaba, haeba re batla ho hohela botsetedi, re tlameha ho rarolla bothata ba ditjeo tse hodimo tsa ho etsa kgwebo aforika borwa, hammoho le ditshebetso tsa taolo tse rarahaneng di bile di nka nako e telele.
zul: uma sifuna ukuncintisana ngempumelelo namazwe omhlaba, futhi uma sifuna ukuheha utshalomali, kumele sithathe izinyathelo zokunciphisa izindleko eziphakeme kakhulu zokwenza ibhizinisi eningizimu afrika, futhi sixegise imithethonqubo nemidanti eyinkimbinkimbi futhi ewundendende okumele ilandelwe.

sot: re tlameha ho fihlella boemong boo e bang ha ho khamphane e tshwanelang ho leta nako e kahodimo ho dikgwedi tse tsheletseng hore e fumane tumello kapa laesense, athe dikhamphane tse ntjha tsona di tshwanelwa ke ho ngodiswa nakong ya letsatsi le le leng.
zul: kumele sifinyelele esigabeni lapho ingekho neyodwa inkampani okumele ilinde isikhathi esingaphezu kwezinyanga eziyisithupha ngaphambi kokuthi ithole imvume noma ilayisensi yokusebenza futhi kumele kube yinto elula nje ukubhalisa inkampani entsha ngosuku olulodwa nje vo.

sot: re tla tswela pele ho fokotsa ditjeo tsa ho etsa kgwebo ka ho fokotsa ditefiso tsa diyantle madibohong, re hahamalla pele ka mekgwa ya ditjeo tse tlase tsa phehlo ya motlakase, le ho etsa dipalangwang tsa diterene hore di kgone ho qothisana lehlokwa di be di sebetse hantle le ho feta.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokunciphisa izindleko zokwenza ibhizinisi ngokuthi sinciphise intela yezimpahla ezithunyelwa emazweni angaphandle, sizame ukuthola nokusebenzisa izindlela zokuphehla ugesi ezishimbile, futhi senze umkhakha wokuthutha impahla ngezitimela ube sesimweni sokuncintisana neminye imikhakha yokuthuthwa kwempahla futhi usebenze ngobunyoninco.

sot: re tataiswa ke ndp, ke boikarabelo ba rona ho hahamalla ntshetsopeleng e kenyeletsang bohle, ya nako e telele ebile e le e tla itwanela diphetohong tsa tlelaemete.
zul: ngokuholwa yi-ndp, kungumthwalo nomsebenzi wethu ukuqinisekisa intuthuko ebandakanya umuntu wonke futhi esimeme, ezokwazi ukumelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

sot: ha re sebetsa ka selekane le lekala la poraefete, bosebetsi le ba matjhabatjhaba.
zul: ngokubambisana nomkhakha ozimele, abasebenzi kanye namazwe omhlaba sizoqinisa futhi sikhuphule imizamo yethu yokumelana nokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu futhi sinciphise nomthelela omubi walokhu.

sot: re na le monyetla wa ho di hula pele kgolong e sa silafatseng tikoloho, diindastering tse ntshang khabone e fokolang haholo, ho katolleng dikgoro ditheknolojing tse ntjha esita le ho hlabeletsa re hahamalletse moruong wa kamoso.
zul: sinethuba lokuqinisekisa ukuthi sihamba phambili emizamweni yokukhulisa umnotho ngendlela ebhekelela futhi inakekele imvelo, sibe nezimboni ezisebenzisa izindlela-kusebenza ezikhiqiza ikhabhoni encane kakhulu futhi ezingawuncolisi umkhathi nemvelo, sihambe phambili ekusetshenzisweni kobuchwepheshe obusha futhi sithathe amagxathu amakhulukazi aphokophele emnothweni wangomuso.

sot: re tlameha ho eketsa seabo sa eneji e ntjhafatsehang le e hlwekileng motswakong wa eneji ya rona ya naha, re be re lekodisise bokgoni ba moruo wa haeterojene.
zul: kumele siwukhulise umthamo wamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo futhi ongayingcolisi imvelo, kwizinhlobo zemithombo kagesi ehlukahlukene esetshenziswa kule lizwe, futhi sizame ukucubungula nokubhekisisa ukuthi ngeke yini kube wusizo ukuthi siguqukele emnothweni ogxile kakhulu ekusetshenzisweni kwegesi ihayidrojini.

sot: kgolo e potlakileng ya moruo e boela e hloka tlhabollo ya mobu e potlakisitsweng dibakeng tsa mahaeng le tsa ditoropong, esita le mmuso o hlaketsweng mabapi le ditokelo tsa thepa.
zul: ukukhula komnotho okusheshayo kudinga futhi ukuthi kusheshiswe izinguquko kwezomhlaba ezindaweni ezisemakhaya kanye nezosemadolobheni futhi kube khona inqubo-kusebenza ecacile ephathelene nokuphathwa kwamalungelo omhlaba.

sot: re se re amohetse tlaleho ya setlamo se eletsang moporesidente ka tlhabollo ya mobu le temothuo, se neng se etelletswe pele ke motlatsi wa moporesidente, e seng e tla tekelwa kabinete bakeng sa ho tshetshethwa.
zul: sesiwutholile umbiko wethimba elikhethekile lokweluleka umongameli mayelana nezinguquko kwezomhlaba nezolimo, elabe liholwa yiphini likamongameli, manje osuzokwethulwa phambi kwekhabhinethi ukuze ucutshungulwe.

sot: dikgothaletso tsa setlamo sena di tla susumetsa ho thethwa ha lenaneo la tlhabollo ya mobu le phethahetseng, la mathulahohle ebile e le le tlisang diphetoho.
zul: izincomo zaleli thimba elikhethekile yizona ezizosetshenziswa ukuhlanganisa nokuphothula uhlelo lwezinguquko kwezomhlaba olubanzi futhi oluzoletha uguquko olunohlonze.

sot: nakong e sa fediseng pelo, mmuso o tla akofisa matsapa a ho hlwaya le ho neelana ka mobu o tshwanetseng bodulo bo botle ba ditoropong, esita le bohwai.
zul: kulesi sikhashana esifushane esizayo, uhulumeni uzosheshisa imizamo yokuhlonza kanye nokwaba umhlaba kahulumeni okulungele ukuhlaliswa kwabantu ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni, onazo izinsiza nezidingongqangi zesimanjemanje, futhi uhulumeni uzokwaba nomhlaba ozosetshenziselwa ukulima.

sot: senyetheng sa ditsiane le boiphumano tse tsebisitsweng ngwahola, re ile ra tshepisa ho bea ka sehloohong taba ya tjhelete ya dihwai tse thuthuang.
zul: kwiphakheji yokukhuthaza nokuvuselela umnotho eyamenyezelwa ngonyaka odlule, sathembisa ukuthi sizokubeka eqhulwini ukuxhaswa ngezimali kwabalimi abasafufusa.

sot: nakong ya ditekanyetso tsa ditjhelete tsa sehla se bohareng, r3.9 bilione e abetswe banka ya tsa mobu hore e tshehetse dihwai tsa kgwebo tsa rantsho.
zul: kulesi sikhathi sesabelo esimaphakathi, ibhange lomhlaba labelwe imali engamabhiliyoni ama-3.9 amarandi ngenhloso yokweseka nokuxhasa abalimi abamnyama abahwebayo.

sot: karolo ya bohlokwa ya lewa la kgolo la aforika borwa ke ho kopanngwa ha moruo wa rona le wa baahisane ba rona, esita le khontinente yohle ya rona.
zul: ingxenye esemqoka kakhulu yeqhingasu lokukhulisa umnotho leningizimu afrika wukudidiyelwa komnotho wakuleli neminotho yamazwe angomakhelwane kanye neminotho yamazwe aleli zwekazi lonkana.

sot: sebaka sa kgwebisano e lokolohileng khontinenteng ya aforika se tla ntlafatsa ho tsamaiswa ha thepa le ditshebeletso, se ntlafatse le tjhelete ya ho qala kgwebo hammoho le mekgwa ya tlhahiso khontinenteng yohle.
zul: isizinda sokuhwebelana mahhala kwamazwe ezwekazi lase-afrika, (i-afcfta), sizothuthukisa futhi senze ngcono ukuhamba nokuthunyelwa kwezimpahla kanye nezinsizakalo, ingqala-bhizinisi kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza zokukhiqiza impahla kwizwekazi lonkana.

sot: lewa la rona la tsosoloso ya diindasteri le shadimme katoloso ya mahokela a rona a kgwebisano le botsetedi ka tshebedisano le lebatowa lohle la aforika e ka borwa esita le khontinente ka bophara.
zul: iqhingasu leningizimu afrika elivuseleliwe futhi lafakwa nomfutho ligxile ekukhuliseni ubudlelwano bokuhwebelana nokutshalwa kwezimali phakathi kwelizwe lethu nesifunda sonkana samazwe aseningizimu ye-afrika kanye nezwekazi lonkana.

sot: kahare ho ntshetsopele ya dinaha tsa borwa ba aforika (sadc), re tla e bea ka sehloohong ntshetsopele ya keketso ya boleng ka mahlakoreng ohle a meedi, makaleng a bohlokwa a kang eneji, merafo le dipeelo tsa ho betlwa ha dirafshwa tse itseng, tlhahiso, meralo ya motheo le ho etswa ha dihlahiswa tsa temothuo.
zul: ngaphakathi kwenhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwamazwe aseningizimu ye-afrika (i-sadc), sizobeka eqhulwini uchungechunge lokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo kanye nokuthunyelwa nokuhanjiswa kwayo phakathi kwamazwe angaphansi kwale nhlangano, okuyimikhiqizo yemikhakha enjengowezamandla, owezimayini nokuthuthukiswa kwekhwalithi yemikhiqizo yezimbiwa, owezokukhiqizwa kwempahla, owezengqalasizinda kanye nowokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo.

sot: maaforika borwa a heso,kgolo ya moruo wa rona e tla ba le boleng bo bonyenyane, ntle leha e ka thea mesebetsi ka bongatanyana.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukukhula komnotho wezwe ngeke neze kuwenze umehluko ophawulekayo uma kungalekeleli ekwakhiweni kwamathuba omsebenzi amaningi.

sot: bonnete ba hore sekgahla sa leqeme la mesebetsi batjheng ba aforika borwa se kahodimo ho 50%, ehlile ke koduwa ya naha e hlokang ditharollo tsa ka potlako, tsa bosibolli le tlhophiseho, moo bohle re tshwanelang ho e bona e le tlhokeho ya ho sebetsa mmoho.
zul: njengoba izinga lokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni lingaphezu kwama-50% kusho ukuthi izwe libhekene nengwadla enkulukazi edinga ukuthi kutholakale izixazululo eziphuthumayo, ezihambisana nokusetshenziswa kwamaqhingasu amasha futhi ezihambelanayo, lapho wonke umuntu kumele akubone njengento edingekayo futhi esemqoka kakhulu ukuthi kusetshenzwe ngokubambisana.

sot: erekaha batjha ba bangatanyana ba kena mesebetsing selemo le selemo, moruo o tshwanela ho thea mesebetsi e mengatanyana ya batjha ho feta kamoo o etsang kateng ha jwale.
zul: futhi njengoba abantu abasha bengena ngobuningi minyaka yonke esigabeni sabantu abathungatha amathuba omsebenzi, umnotho wezwe kumele wakhe amathuba omsebenzi aqondiswe entsheni angaphezulu kakhulu kwamathuba avulekayo njengamanje.

sot: hore feela o boloke sekgahla sa leqeme la mesebetsi ya batjha se le tlase.
zul: ngenhloso nje yokuqinisekisa ukuthi alidlondlobali ngokweqile izinga lokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni.

sot: nnete ya mmakoma ke hore ha ho tluwa ditabeng tsa leqeme la mesebetsi batjheng, re tshwanela ho matha lepatlaka, empa re eme nqa e le nngwe.
zul: iqiniso elimsulwa wukuthi mayelana nenkinga yokuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi entsheni, kumele senze imizamo enohlonze futhi ephuthumayo, ngenhloso nje yokunciphisa amanani aphakeme kakhulu esibhekene nawo njengamanje entsha ehleli emakhaya engasebenzi, singakayibali intsha esazophuma ezikhungweni zemfundo, nayo ifune umsebenzi.

sot: kahoo ho a hlokeha hore re tswele pele ho kenya tshebetsong morero o phethahetseng ntle le tieho – o thakgolwang o bile o hlophiswa kantorong ya mopresidente – hore ho theelwe batjha mesebetsi e metjha e seng katlase ho dimilione tse pedi nakong ya dilemo tse leshome tse tlang.
zul: ngakho-ke kusemqoka kakhulu ukuthi siluqalise ngokushesha okukhulu uhlelo olubanzi – oluqhutshwa futhi lulawulwe yihhovisi likamongameli – ukuze kwakhiwe amathuba amasha omsebenzi aqondiswe entsheni, angekho ngaphansi kwezigidi ezimbili kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo.

sot: morero ona o tla sebediswa mafapheng ohle a mmuso esita le makaleng ohle a mararo a mmuso, ka selekane le lekala la poraefete.
zul: lolu hlelo luzosebenza kuyo yonke iminyango kahulumeni futhi lusebenze kuzona zontathu izigaba zikahulumeni, ngokubambisana nabomkhakha ozimele.

sot: re se re ntse re sebetsa le lekala la poraefete ho thea metjha ya mesebetsi bakeng sa batjha, ka ho eketsa metjha e seng e le teng ya bolaodi ba marangrang.
zul: sesiqalile kakade ukusebenzisana nabomkhakha ozimele ekwakheni imigudu yokufaka abantu abasha emsebenzini ngokuthi sikhulise futhi sithuthukise izinhlelo ezikhona njengamanje zokuphathwa kwemigudu yokufakwa kwentsha emsebenzini.

sot: ana ke marangrang a dumellang batjha ba kgethang ponahalo e eketsehileng, tshehetso le menyetla ya marangrang ho bontsha boteng ba bona bakeng sa mesebetsi le ho itshebetsa.
zul: lezi yizinhlelo ezivumela labo bantu abasha ababhalise ngaphansi kwazo ukuthi babonakale kalula, bathole ukwesekwa kanye namathuba azokwenza ukuthi bavele obala ukuze babonakale kalula ukuthi badinga amathuba omsebenzi noma amathuba okusungula amabhizinisi.

sot: ba netefatsa hore batjha ba tswang malapeng a futsanehileng – haholoholo barwetsana – ba a matlafatswa hore ba nke menyetla e metjha.
zul: lezi zinhlelo ziyaqinisekisa ukuthi intsha evela emakhaya ahlwempu – futhi ikakhulukazi abesifazane abasebasha – iyahlonyiswa futhi icijwe ngendlela efanele ukuze ikwazi ukuwabamba ngazo zombili amathuba amasha avelayo.

sot: mmuso o tla tswela pele ho fana ka mesebetsi ka lenaneo la mesebetsi ya setjhaba e atolotsweng (epwp), haholoholo dikarolong tseo ho sebetswang ka thata ho tsona jwaloka tokisong le paballong ya dithepa, ho kgotha dihlahla, ho kiba moo ho dutlang metsi le ho aha mebila.
zul: uhulumeni uzoqhubeka nokuhlinzeka amathuba omsebenzi ngaphansi kohlelo olunwetshiwe lwemisebenzi yomphakathi (i-epwp), ikakhulukazi emikhakheni edinga abasebenzi abaningi njengomkhakha wokulungiswa kwengqalasizinda, ukuhlakulwa kokhula nokususwa kwezihlahla nezitshalo ezingadingekile, ukuvalwa kwamapayipi amanzi avuzayo kanye nokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo.

sot: re tla tswela pele ho etsa mananeo a ho netefatsa hore batjha ba kotetsweng moruong ba lokela mesebetsi, ba be ba kenngwe makaleng ao ho ona ‘tlhokeho ya mesebetsi’ e holang.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokuthuthukisa izinhlelo zokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha abangasebenzi bakulungele ukusebenza futhi bayafakwa emsebenzini kuleyo mikhakha lapho kunamathuba omsebenzi akhulayo.

sot: makala ana a akga ditsi tsa mehala tsa ditshebeletso tsa matjhaba tsa kgwebo ya ho lokiswa ha dihlahiswa, keketso ya boleng ho tsa temothuo, ho hokelwa ha dintho tsa setekgeniki, ditokiso le poloko ya boemo bo le botle, esita le menyetla e metjha eo ho fanwang ka yona ka moruo wa dijithale le maemo a bone a ditheknoloji tse fetofetohang diindastering (4ir).
zul: le mikhakha ibandakanya imikhakha enjengowezinsizakalo zamazwe ngamazwe zokuhlinzeka usizo ngocingo, uchungechunge lomsebenzi wokulungiswa kwemikhiqizo yezolimo, ukuxhunywa kwemishini yezobuchwepheshe, ukulungiswa nokugcinwa kwemishini isesimweni sokusebenza esihle kanye namathuba amasha ahlinzekwa ngumnotho wezobuxhakaxhaka nobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kanye noguquko lwezimboni lwesine olugxile ekusetshenzisweni kobuchwepheshe besimanjemanje.

sot: mmuso o tla boela o netefatsa hore batjha ba a hirwa mesebetsing ya moruo wa kahisano e kang tlhokomelo ya kgodiso ya bana le ya bophelo bo botle.
zul: uhulumeni uzoqhubeka futhi nokuqinisekisa ukuthi abantu abasha bayaqashwa ezinhlanganweni nasezikhungweni zomphakathi ezinjengezikhungo zokuthuthukiswa kwezingane zisencane kanye nezinhlangano ezihlinzeka ngosizo lwezempilo nokunakekelwa.

sot: re tla atolla tshebeletso ya batjha ya naha, hore e nke batjha ba 50 000 ka selemo.
zul: sizolukhulisa uhlelo lukazwelonke lokuvulwa kwemisebenzi eqondiswe entsheni ukuze luqashe abantu abasha abayizi-50 000 njalo ngonyaka.

sot: mmuso o tla tshehetsa mapatlelo a thusang ka theknoloji bakeng sa batjha ba itshebetsang dibakeng tsa mahaeng le makeisheneng.
zul: uhulumeni uzosekela futhi axhase izinhlelo-kusebenza zobuchwepheshe eziqondiswe kubantu abasha abangosomabhizinisi ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nasemalokishini.

sot: re tla atolla mananeo a rona ho thusa batjha ho fumana malebela a ho lefshwa mosebetsing, ka matsholo a kang tshebeletso ya mesebetsi ya batjha, esita le ho hlophisa boithuto ba boitlwaetso ba mesebetsing.
zul: sizozikhulisa izinhlelo zethu ukuze silekelele abantu abasha bakwazi ukuthola ulwazi nesipiliyoni somsebenzi lapho bezokwenza umsebenzi abazowuholela, ngaphansi kwezinhlelo ezinjengohlelo lophiko lokuqashwa kwentsha (i-yes), futhi silekelele intsha ekutholeni amathuba okuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini.

sot: re tla aha ditsi tsa kgodiso ya dikgwebo tse nyenyane, ho fa dikgwebo tse qalwang ke batjha keletso ya tsa ditjhelete le dinnete tsa tshebetso ha ba qala ho thakgola dikgwebo tsa bona.
zul: sizohlinzeka ngezizinda zokulekelela nokuhlinzeka ngosizo emabhizinisini amancane ngenhloso yokunikeza abantu abasha izeluleko eziphathelene nezimali kanye nokuqhutshwa kwebhizinisi ngenkathi besungula amabhizinisi abo.

sot: maobane mona, ke bile le monyetla o moholo wa ho teana le ho dula majwana le batjha ba bangatanyana ba aforika borwa ba etsang mosebetsi o motle ruri wa ho aha naha ya rona ba bile ba ntshetsa pele batho ba habo rona.
zul: izolo, kube yintokozo enkulu kimina ukuhlangana nokuxoxisana neqenjana labantu abasha baseningizimu afrika abenza umsebenzi omuhle kakhulu ekwakheni izwe lethu kanye nokuthuthukisa abantu bakithi.

sot: ke bahwebi ebile ke baahi ba setjhaba, ke baitseki hape ke banono.
zul: bangosomabhizinisi, abathuthukisi bomphakathi, izishoshovu kanye namaciko.

sot: haeba ho na le ntho e le nngwe eo re ithutileng yona dipuisanong le batjha ba naha ena, ke hore ha re ka ke ra qobella ditharollo tsa rona ho bona: ntho enngwe le enngwe eo re tshwanelang ho e etsa e tlameha ho etellwa pele ke batjha ka bobona.
zul: enye yezinto ezisemqoka esizifundile kulezi zingxoxo ebesizibambe nentsha yaleli lizwe wukuthi akumele siqhamuke nezixazululo ezicatshangwa yithina bese sithi mabazisebenzise: konke esikwenzayo kumele kuholwe ngabantu abasha ngokwabo.

sot: ba re bolelletse ka seo ba se batlang le seo ba se hlokang.
zul: basitshelile ukuthi yini abayifunayo, futhi yini abayidingayo.

sot: ba batla ho hirwa, ehlile, empa ba boetse ba batla ho ba bahiri.
zul: yebo, bayakufuna impela ukuqashwa, kepha-ke futhi bafuna nokuba ngabaqashi ngokwabo.

sot: ba na le maikutlo a kgaphatsehang, ba tshwere teu bosibolling, mme ba batla ho iketsetsa dintho tsa bona.
zul: baqhamuke nemiqondo-mbono eminingi futhi ehlukahlukene, bahamba phambili ekusetshenzisweni kwezindlela-kusebenza ezintsha, futhi bafuna ukuzenzela izinto ngokwabo.

sot: re tshwanela ho tshehetsa tlhase ya bohwebi hobane matlotlo a naha ena a itshetlehile bokgoning le neong ya bonono ba batjha ba rona.
zul: kumele siyeseke le ntshisekelo yentsha ekusunguleni amabhizinisi ngoba phela impumelelo yaleli lizwe incike emdlandleni wabantu abasha kanye nasethalenteni labo lokuqhamuka nemiqondo emisha kanye nezindlela-kusebenza ezintsha.

sot: maaforika borwa a heso,haeba re tshwanela ho netefatsa hore nakong ya dilemo tse leshome tse tlang ngwana e mong le e mong ya dilemo di leshome o kgona ho bala ka kutlwisiso, re tla tlameha ho ngoka setjhaba sohle hore se tshehetse letsholo la letonana la ho bala.
zul: bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kule minyaka eyi-10 ezayo zonke izingane ezineminyaka eyi-10 ziyakwazi ukufunda futhi zikuqonda kahle lokho ezikufundayo, kumele sigqugquzele isizwe sonke ukuthi siweseke umkhankaso omkhulukazi wokufunda.

sot: ho tseba ho bala dilemong tsa bongwana ke motheo wa mantlha o lepang kgatelopele ya thuto ya ngwana, ka sekolo, ka thutong e phahameng esita le ka mosebetsing.
zul: ukufunda kwengane isencane kuyinto eyisisekelo, futhi ukuphumelela nokuqhubekela phambili kwengane emfundweni yayo kuncike kulokhu.

sot: mehato e meng yohle ya bokenadipakeng – ho tloha mosebetsing o etsuwang wa ho ntlafatsa boleng ba thuto ya motheo ho isa phanong ya thuto e phahameng ya mahala ho bafutsana, ho tloha botseteding ba rona dikholetjheng tsa thupelo ya setekgeniki le mesebetsi ya matsoho ho isa katolosong ya boithuto dibakeng tseo ho sebetswang ho tsona – re ke ke ra hlahisa diphetho tseo re di hlokang ntle le ha re ka qala ka ho netefatsa hore bana ba tseba ho bala.
zul: kusukela esikoleni kuqhubeke njalo kuyongena emfundweni ephakeme kuze kuyofinyelela nasemsebenzini imbala.

sot: matitjhere ohle a mophato wa motheo le o mahareng a tlameha ho rupellwa hore a rute ho bala le ho ngola ka senyesemane le maleme a seaforika, ebile re se re ntse re rupella re bile re jala mabotho a bakwetlisi ba nang le malebela hore ba ilo fana ka tshehetso ya boleng bo hodimo moo matitjhere a leng hona teng.
zul: zonke ezinye izinhlelo zethu – kusukela emsebenzini owenziwayo ukwenza ngcono izinga lemfundo eyisisekelo kuyofinyelela ekuhlinzekweni kwemfundo ephakeme yamahhala kubantu abahlwempu, kusukela kutshalomali nokwesekwa esikunikeza amakolishi ezobuchwepheshe nemisebenzi yobungoti bezandla kuyofinyelela ekukhulisweni kwezinhlelo zokuqeqeshelwa emsebenzini – ngeke neze zikhiqize imiphumela emihle uma singaqali ngokuqinisekisa ukuthi izingane ziyakwazi ukufunda.

sot: re kenya tshebetsong lenaneo la ho bala la mephato ya mathomo, le fupereng lethathama le kopantsweng la merero ya thuto, disebediswa tse ding tsa ho bala esita le tshehetso ya seporofeshenale matitjhereng a mophato wa motheo.
zul: yizinhlelo ezinjengomkhankaso wokufunda kazwelonke ezizokwenza sikwazi ukuqhuba ngempumelelo lo mzamo owenziwa ezweni lonkana.

sot: sena se bopa karolo ya matsapa a batsi a ho matlafatsa tsamaiso ya thuto ya motheo ka ho matlafatsa dihlopha tsa boetapele ba dikolo, ho ntlafatsa bokgoni ba matitjhere le ho netefatsa boteng ba mehato e tsitsitseng haholwanyane ya kgatelopele bakeng sa mophato wa boraro, wa botshelela le wa borobong.
zul: bonke othisha bezinga eliyisisekelo kanye nelimaphakathi bazoqeqeshelwa ukufundisa isingisi kanye nezilimi zabomdabu, futhi njengamanje siqeqesha amaqembu abaqeqeshi esizobathumela ezikoleni ukuthi bayohlinzeka ngosizo olusezingeni eliphezulu kothisha ngaphakathi esikoleni.

sot: re boela re tlameha ho rupella batjha ba rona bakeng sa mesebetsi ya kamoso.
zul: siqalisa uhlelo lokufunda emabangeni aphansi, olubandakanya izinhlelo zesifundo ezinako konke, izincwadi zokufunda ezengeziwe kanye nosizo longoti kothisha bezinga eliyisisekelo.

sot: ke kahoo re lelekelang dithuto tse rutang baithuti dithuto tse kang tsa ho ngola dikhoutu tsa dikhomphyutha le dithuto tsa ho sekaseka lesedi ka dikhomphyutha ba sa ntsane ba le dikolong tsa poraemare.
zul: lokhu kuyingxenye yemizamo ebanzi yokuqinisa uhlelo lwemfundo eyisisekelo ngokucija nokuhlomisa amathimba abaphathi bezikole, siphucule amakhono othisha futhi siqinisekise ukusetshenziswa kwendlela ethembakele yokukala inqubekelaphambili yabafundi ebangeni lesithathu, elesithupha kanye nelesishiyagalolunye.

sot: kgato ya pele ke ho eketsa ponahalo ya mapolesa ka ho hira mapolesa a mangatanyana, esita le ho thea lepatlelo la hore baahi ba kenye letsoho ka diforamo tse sebetsang hantle tsa bopolesa ba setjhaba.
zul: yingakho, ezikoleni zamabanga aphansi, sethula izifundo enjengomsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwamakhodi ezinhlelo-kusebenza zamakhompyutha (izifundo ze-coding) kanye nomsebenzi wokuhlola nokuhlaziya i-data (i-data analytics).

sot: ha jwale, ho na le baithuti ba kahodimo ho 5 000 ba ngodiseditsweng thupelo ya motheo dikholetjheng tsa rona tsa thupelo ya mapolesa, mme re lohotha hore lenane lena le tla be le ekeditswe ho ya ho 7 000 nakong ya makgetlo a mabedi a tlang ha ho tla be ho nkuwa ba bang.
zul: isinyathelo sokuqala wukukhulisa inani lamaphoyisa abonakala ehamba hamba emphakathini, ngokuthi kuqashwe amaphoyisa angeziwe, kanye nokwenza isimo esizoholela ekutheni izakhamuzi zibambe iqhaza ngenkuthalo ngaphansi kwamaqenjana omphakathi asebenzisana namaphoyisa (ama-cpf) asebenza kahle.

sot: re sebeletsa ho ntlafatsa sekgahla sa dikatleho ho batlisiseng le ho tjhutjhisweng ha ditlolo tsa molao, ho netefatsa thupello e ntlenyana le seporofeshenale ka tsamaiso ya toka ditlolong tsa molao.
zul: njengamanje, bangaphezu kwezi-5 000 abafundi ababhaliselwe ukuqeqeshwa okuyisisekelo emakolishi ethu okuqeqesha amaphoyisa futhi sibheke ukuthi leli nani likhuphuke liyofinyelela kwizi-7 000 ngomjikelezo ngamunye kumahlandla okuqeqeshwa kwamaphoyisa amabili ezayo.

sot: ditlolo tsa molao tse nang le dikgoka ke bothata setjhabeng di hloka tsheohelo e batsi ya setjhaba.
zul: senza imizamo yokwenza ngcono amazinga empumelelo yokuphenywa nokushushiswa kwamacala, kanye nokuqiniseka ukuqeqeshwa okungcono kanye nokusebenza ngobungoti nobunyoninco ohlelweni lwezobulungiswa nokulwisana nobugebengu.

sot: re sebetsa le mekgatlo ya setjhaba ka mawala a ho fedisa dikgoka tse amanang le bong (gbv) esita le diphenetho tsa ba batshehadi.
zul: ubugebengu obuhambisana nodlame buyinkinga yezwe lonkana, futhi edinga ukuthi kuthathwe izinyathelo ezibandakanya abantu bonke.

sot: kamora metshetshetho e matla, re sebeletsa ho thea lekgotla le kgahlanong le gbv esita le diphenetho tsa ba batshehadi hammoho le morero wa lewa la naha, tse tla re tataisa bohle, kae kapa kae moo re leng teng, matsapeng a rona a ho fedisa sewa sena sa naha.
zul: sizebenzisana nezinhlangano zomphakathi ukuthola amaqhingasu okunqanda nokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane.

sot: re matlafatsa re bile re hlomella tsamaiso ya sepolesa le makgotla a dinyewe, ho tshehetsa mahlatsipa a gbv.
zul: kulandela ukubonisana okunohlonze, senza imizamo yokusungula umkhandlu wokulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane kanye nohlelo lukazwelonke olukhethekile oluzoba ngumhlahlandlela wethu sonke, kungakhathalekile ukuthi sikuphi, emizamweni yethu yokuqeda lesi sihlava esisabalele ezweni lonkana.

sot: re tiisa twantsho ya maqulwana a dithethefatsi ka ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha lewa la naha le kgahlanong le maqulwana a dinokwane esita le morero wa naha o lekotsweng botjha wa ho hlola dithethefatsi.
zul: simatasa sicija futhi sihlomise amaphoyisa kanye nezinkantolo ekusekeleni izisulu zodlame olubhekiswe obulilini obuthile.

sot: bomme le bontate,baeti ba bohlokwa ba qollehileng,katleho ya dipheo tsena tsohle e hloka puso e nang le bokgoni ebile e le e tswelang pele.
zul: siyayiqinisa impi yokulwisana namaqembu ezigelekeqe eziqhuba ibhizinisi lokuthengisa izidakamizwa, ngokuqalisa iqhingasu likazwelonke lokulwisana namaqembu emigulukudu kanye nohlelo-ngqangi lukazwelonke lokulwisana nezidakamizwa.

sot: ena ke naha e sa faneng feela ka ditheo le meralo ya motheo e thusang moruo le setjhaba ho sebetsa, empa e na le bokgoni ba ho ntshetsa pele diphetoho.
zul: manene namanenekazi, zimenywa ezikhethekile, ukufezekiswa kwazo zonke lezi zinjongo kudinga umbuso onamandla nekhono lokusebenza kanye nezinsiza-kusebenza ezidingekayo, futhi othuthukisayo.

sot: pejana kgweding ena, re tsebisitse ka popobotjha ya mafapha a mangatanyana ho a thusa ho sebetsa dithomong tsa wona.
zul: lowo akuwona nje umbuso ohlinzeka kuphela ngezikhungo kanye nengqalasizinda ezokwenza ukuthi umnotho wezwe kanye nomphakathi usebenze, kodwa ngumbuso onezindlela-kusebenza zokuletha uguquko.

sot: ena ke qaleho ya mosebetsi o batsi wa ho kgina nyotobelo ya bokgoni ba naha esita le ho hlopha botjha mokgwa wa rona wa phano ya ditshebeletso, ho etsetsa hore o tle o sebeletse baahi ba naha ya rona ka bokgabane.
zul: ngasekuqaleni kwale nyanga, samemezela ukuhlelwa kabusha kweminyango kahulumeni eminingana ukuze ikwazi ukwenza kahle imisebenzi ethweswe yona.

sot: re tla ananela mokgwa oo motheo wa wona e leng ditereke – re tsepamisitse maikutlo diterekeng tse 44 le bomasepaleng ba baholo ba robedi – ho akofisa phano ya ditshebeletso, ho netefatsa hore bomasepala ba tshehetswa ka nepo ba bile ba hlomellwa ka ho lekaneng.
zul: isinqumo sethu besisekelwe phezu komzamo wokuqiniseksa ukusebenza ngobunyoninco, ukunciphisa izindleko, ukuphatha ngokubambisana kanye nokuhambelanisa imisebenzi eyenziwa yiminyango kahulumeni ehlukahlukene.

sot: ho netefatsa hore naha e kgona ho thusa ntshetsopeleng e ntle ya moruo le setjhaba, ho bohlokwa hore re matlafatse dikgwebo tsa mmuso (di-soe).
zul: lokhu kuyisiqalo senqubo ebanzi yokunqanda ukufadalala kwamandla okusebenza ombuso kanye nokuhlela kabusha uhlelo-kusebenza lwethu lokuhlinzeka ngezidingo-ngqangi ukuze lukwazi ukuzisebenzela kahle kakhulu izakhamuzi zezwe lethu.

sot: ka lekgotla la moporesidente la di-soe, mmuso o ikemiseditse ho thea tlhophiso dipakeng tsa dikhamphane tsohle tseo e leng tsa mmuso esita le ho hlalosisa dithomo tsa tsona tse fapaneng.
zul: sizosebenzisa inqubo-kusebenza ezogxila ezifundeni ezingama-44 nemikhandlu-dolobha eyisishiyagalombili ngenhloso yokusheshisa ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingo-ngqangi, futhi kuqinisekiswe ukuthi omasipala bahlinzekwa ngokwesekwa okufanelekile futhi banikezwe nezinsiza-kusebenza ezanele.

sot: ka lekgotla lena, re tla sebetsa le baetapele ba di-soe ho thea tikoloho ya molao le taolo e kgothaletsang tshibollo le mahlahahlaha, ebile e ntlafatsa maemo a tsona a ho qothisana lehlokwa.
zul: ngenhloso yokuqinisekisa ukuthi umbuso uyakwazi ukuletha kahle intuthuko kwezomnotho kanye nakwezenhlalo yomphakathi, kusemqoka kakhulu ukuthi siqinise amabhizinisi ombuso (ama-soe).

sot: re tla ahella hodima mosebetsi oo re seng re o thakgotse ho rarolla mathata a puso e mpe, ho se sebetse hantle le botsitso ho tsa ditjhelete.
zul: ngokusebenzisa umkhandlu kamongameli wama-soe, uhulumeni uhlose ukuqinisekisa ukusebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo phakathi kwazo zonke izinkampani zombuso futhi kucaciswe kahle namagunya nemisebenzi ezethweswe yona ngokuhlukahlukana kwazo.

sot: re ikitlaelleditse ho aha naha e tsitlallelang molao moo ho yona ho se nang bonyofonyofo, sewesoweso, boithuiso le ho hwebeletswa ha tjhelete ya setjhaba.
zul: ngaphansi kwalo mkhandlu, sizosebenzisana nabaholi bama-soe ukuthuthukisa imithetho nemithethonqubo ezogqugquzela ukusetshenziswa kwezindlela ezintsha zesimanjemanje ezihambisana nokukhalipha okukhulu futhi kwenziwe ngcono nekhono namandla okuncintisana kwalezi zinkampani nezimbangi zazo kwezebhizinisi.

sot: re batla sehlopha sa basebetsi ba setjhaba ba nang le boqhetseke le boporofeshenale ba maemo a hodimo – bo nyehelwang tshebeletsong ya setjhaba.
zul: sizokwakhela phezu komsebenzi osuqalisiwe kakade okuhloswe ngawo ukuxazulula izinkinga zokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, nokuhluleka ukusebenza ngobunyoninco kanye nezinkinga eziphathelene nokusimama ngakwezezimali.

sot: dikgato tseo re di nkileng tsa ho fedisa tshusumetso e bolotsana diqetong tsa mmuso le twantshong ya bonyofonyofo, ho akga le dikgato tsa ho matlafatsa lekgotla la botjhutjhisi ba naha (npa), yuniti ya dipatlisiso tse kgethehileng (siu), tshebeletso ya pokello ya lekgetho ya aforika borwa (sars) le lekala la tshireletso ya mmuso (ssa), di kgola ditholwana tsa bohlokwa.
zul: sizibophezele ekwakheni umbuso olandela izinkambiso zokusebenza ngobuqotho lapho ingekho nakancane inkohlakalo, ukwenzelela, ukuzicebisa ngokungemthetho, kanye nokweba imali kahulumeni.

sot: re kopile mookamedi wa naha wa botjhutjhisi ba setjhaba ho etsa morero wa ho eketsa haholwanyane bokgoni le tshebetso e ntle ya npa, ho akga le ho netefatsa boteng ba tshebetso e ntle ya kgapo ya thepa.
zul: sifuna ukuba neqembu labasebenzi bakahulumeni abanekhono, abasebenza ngobungoti futhi abenza umsebenzi wabo ngobuqotho obukhulu futhi abazinikele emsebenzini wabo wokusebenzela umphakathi.

sot: re tshwanela ho netefatsa hore tjhelete ya setjhaba e utswitsweng e a kgutliswa mme e sebedisetswa phano ya ditshebeletso le meralo ya motheo ya mantlha dibakeng tse futsanehileng.
zul: seziqalile ukukhiqiza imiphumela emihle futhi esemqoka izinyathelo esizithathile zokuqeda ukubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso kanye nokulwisana nenkohlakalo, kubandakanya nezinyathelo zokuqinisa uphiko lukazwelonke lwezokushushisa (i-npa), uphiko lokuphenywa kwamacala akhethekile (i-siu), uphiko lokuqoqwa kwentela lwaseningizimu afrika (i-sars) kanye nenhlangano kahulumeni yezokuvikela.

sot: re lebelletse hore lekgotla le letjha le kgethehileng la siu le tla thakgola mosebetsi wa lona dikgweding tse mmalwa tse tlang ho akofisa ditseko tsa setjhaba tse ropohang dipatlisisong tsa siu, tseo e bang ha jwale di hakanyetswa ho r14.7 bilione.
zul: sesinxuse umqondisi kazwelonke wezokushushiswa komphakathi (i-ndpp) ukuthi athuthukise uhlelo oluzophucula futhi luthuthukise kakhudlwana amandla okusebenza kanye nobunyoninco be-npa, kubandakanya nokuqinisekisa ukuthi uqhutshwa kahle futhi ngobunono umsebenzi wokudliwa kwempahla etholakale ezenzweni zobugebengu nenkohlakalo.

sot: aforika borwa e tla tswela pele ho ba le seabo sa bohlokwa dikamanong tsa matjhaba e le ho tsoma kgotso le tshireletso lefatsheng lohle, ntshetsopele le katleho tse reretsweng batho bohle.
zul: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi iyabuyiswa imali kahulumeni entshontshiwe ukuze isetshenziselwe ukuhlinzeka izidingo-ngqangi kanye nengqalasizinda eyisisekelo edingeka kakhulu emiphakathini edla imbuya ngothi.

sot: re ntjhafatsa boikitlaetso ba rona ba ho sebetsa ka tumellano le dinaha tsa matjhaba ho boloka le ho tshireletsa tsamaiso ya dinaha tse ngata e itshetlehileng ka melawana, moo matjhaba a kopaneng (un) a leng ka sehloohong.
zul: sibheke ukuthi inkantolo entsha ekhethekile ye-siu iqale umsebenzi wayo kulezi zinyanga ezimbalwa ezizayo ngenhloso yokusheshisa amacala okudliwa kwempahla ahlobene nophenyo lwe-siu, njengamanje alinganiselwa kwinani-bungako elingamabhiliyoni ayi-14.7 amarandi.

sot: re tla sebedisa botho ba rona ba lekgotla la tshireletso la un ho kgothaletsa tharollo ya dikgohlano ka kgotso, haholoholo khontinenteng ya rona.
zul: iningizimu afrika izoqhubeka nokudlala indima esemqoka kwezobudlelwane bamazwe omhlaba emizamweni yokuqinisekisa ukuthula nokuvikeleka emhlabeni, intuthuko egxile kubantu kanye nokuchuma nokuphumelela kwabantu bonke.

sot: maaforika borwa a heso,haeba re batla ho fihlella aforika borwa eo re e labalabelang, re hloka tumellano e ntjha ya setjhaba.
zul: siyakuvuselela ukuzibophezela kwethu ekusebenzisaneni okuhle namazwe omhlaba ngenhloso yokugcina nokuvikela uhlelo lokubambisana nokusebenzisana kwamazwe ngamazwe olusekelwe phezu kwemithetho ebekiwe, oluholwa yinhlangano yezizwe (i-un).

sot: re tshwanela ho bopa selekane se tiileng dipakeng tsa mmuso, dikgwebo, mekgatlong ya bosebetsi, setjhaba le mekgatlong ya setjhaba.
zul: sizosebenzisa isikhundla sethu njengelungu lomkhandlu wezokuvikela we-un, (i-unsc), ukugqugquzela imizamo yokuxazulula izingxabano ngokuthula, ikakhulukazi kwizwekazi lase-afrika bantu bakithi, ukuze sikwazi ukufinyelela kuhlobo lweningizimu afrika esiyifisayo, sidinga isivumelwano sokusebenzisana nokubambisana esisha.

sot: mmuso o tlameha ho thea tikoloho e ntle, o sebedise mehlodi ya setjhaba ka bohlale o be o tsetele kahong ya bokgoni ba batho ba naha ena.
zul: kudingeka ukuthi sakhe ubambiswano oluqinile phakathi kukahulumeni, abasebenzi, imiphakathi kanye nezinhlangano zomphakathi.

sot: re lakatsa hore dikgwebo di nkele hloohong dipheo tsa lewa la naha le maikutlo a setjhaba diqetong le diketsong tsa tsona.
zul: uhulumeni kumele akhe isimo esifanelekile, azisebenzise ngobuhlakani izinsiza nezimali zakhe futhi atshale izimali ekuthuthukiseni abasebenzi baleli lizwe.

sot: re a dumela hore bosebetsi bo tshwanela ho ntshetsa pele ditabatabelo tsa basebetsi, ha ka lehlakoreng le leng, bo kgothaletsa botsitso ba dikgwebo le tlhahiso ya mesebetsi.
zul: kungaba yinto enhle impela uma abamabhizinisi bengazibhekelela izinjongo zezwe ezisemqoka kanye nezidingo zomphakathi ngenkathi bethatha izinqumo kanye nezinyathelo zabo.

sot: mekgatlo ya setjhaba e tshwanela ho tswela pele ho etsa seabo sa yona sa hore mmuso o nke boikarabelo, empa e boela e tlameha ho ikamahanya le rona mesebetsing eo re e etsang ho fihlella dipheo tsa rona tse tshwanang.
zul: siyavuma ukuthi izinyunyana zabasebenzi kumele zilwele amalungelo abasebenzi, futhi kusenjalo, zigqugquzele ukusimama kwamabhizinisi nokwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi.

sot: re lelaletsa mahlo a rona mekgweng e palamenteng ena hore e be karolo ya bohlokwa selekaneng sena, e kenye letsoho, e tle le maikutlo le ditharollo tse tshwarehang esita le matsapa a ho bapatsa ditabatabelo tsa naha.
zul: izinhlangano zomphakathi wonkana kumele ziqhubeke nokudlala indima yazo yokuqinisekisa ukuthi uhulumeni uyaphendula ngemisebenzi yakhe, kodwa futhi kumele zihlanganyele nathi ekuthatheni izinyathelo eziphathekayo okuhloswe ngazo ukufezekisa izinjongo zethu sonke.

sot: momahano ena ya setjhaba e batla e mong le e mong a be le seabo.
zul: lesi sivumelwano sokubambisana komphakathi wonkana sidinga ukuthi wonke umuntu afake isandla.

sot: e tla boela e hloka bointshasehlabelo le boitelo.
zul: futhi sidinga ukuzidela kanye nokuhlangabezana phakathi, ukuze kube khona ukuvumelana nokusebenzisana okuhle.

sot: ho fihlella moo re habileng teng ho itshetlehile boitshwarong ba e mong le e mong.
zul: impumelelo yomuntu wonke incike kwindlela aziphatha ngayo omunye nomunye wethu.

sot: haeba ra tshwanela ho tsosolosa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha ndp, re tlameha ho akga mahlo a rona bokamosong bo batsibatsi.
zul: ukuze sikwazi ukuvuselela nokufaka ugqozi nofuqufuqu ekuqalisweni kwe-ndp, kumele siqinisekise ukuthi amehlo ethu ahlala ethe njo phambili lapho siphokophele khona.

sot: re batla aforika borwa eo ho yona bohle ba nyakallelang katleho le boiketlo.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika lapho wonke muntu ezophila kamnandi futhi ahlale ngokunethezeka, akhombe ngophakathi.

sot: empa re boela re batla aforika borwa eo ho yona re tla thathalatsa makgabane a rona kahohlehohle ha re ntse re hahamalla pele tseleng ya rona ya kgatelopele.
zul: kodwa-ke futhi sifuna iningizimu afrika lapho sizokwazi ukusebenzisa ngokuphelele amandla namakhono ethu ngenkathi siqhubeka endleleni ephokophele phambili.

sot: re batla aforika borwa e beileng diporo tsa diterene ka sehloohong, e ahang diterene tse tsamayang ka lebelo le hodimo tse kopanyang ditoropo tsa rona tse kgolo le dibaka tse dikgotjheletsaneng ka ho fetisisa tsa naha ya rona.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika ebeke eqhulwini izinhlelo zayo zokuthutha ngesitimela futhi okuyizinhlelo ezikhiziqa izitimela ezihamba ngesivinini esikhulu ezizoxhumanisa amadolobhakazi ethu nezindawo zasemakhaya ezisemajukujukwini ezwe lethu.

sot: re tshwanela ho araburetsa ka naha eo ho yona diterene tse lebelo la kulo di fetang johannesburg ha di haola ho tloha mona ho ya musina, di bile di emisa buffalo city ha di le tseleng e tswang thekong di kgutlela kwano motse kapa.
zul: kumele sizibone ngamehlo engqondo sesiphila ezweni lapho izitimela ezihamba ngesivinini esikhulu zidlula egoli ziphokophele e-musina, futhi lapho zifika e-buffalo city zithi ukuma kancane, zivela ethekwini, sezibuyela emuva lapha edolobheni lasekapa.

sot: re batla aforika borwa e nang le moruo o sebedisang theknoloji ya maemo a hodimo moo ditshebeletso tsa e-health, dirobotiki le meriana e tshophodi di sebediswang ha re ntse re anetsa nhi.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika enomnotho ogxile kubuchwepheshe besimanjemanje lapho sisebenzisa khona izindlela-kusebenza zezempilo ezihlinzekwa ngohlelo-kusebenza lwe-inthanethi, nama-robotics kanye nokwelashwa okuhlinzekwa ezigulini ezikude kwezindawo zokwelapha, ngenkathi siqalisa ukusebenza kwe-nhi.

sot: ke aforika borwa ya mofuta ofe eo re e batlang?
zul: nhloboni yeningizimu afrika esiyifisayo?

sot: re batla aforika borwa e sa rekisetseng dintho tsa yona kantle feela, empa e fetohileng kgubu ya tlhahiso bakeng sa disebedisuwa tsa bohlokwa tse sebediswang ho diilektroniki, makoloing le dikhomphyutheng.
zul: sifuna iningizimu afrika engagcini nje kuphela ngokuthumela kwamanye amazwe imikhiqizo engakalungiswa, kepha eyisizinda esisezingeni lomhlaba sokukhiqizwa kwezingxenye ezisemqoka ezisetshenziswa kuma-elekthronikhi, ezimotweni kanye nakumakhompyutha.

sot: re tlameha ho ba naha e ka iphepang ebile e momahanya ditshebeletso tsa temothuo ya sejwalejwale.
zul: kumele sibe yizwe elikwaziyo ukuzondla futhi lokhu sikwenze ngokusebenzisa ubuchwepheshe besimanjemanje kwezolimo.

sot: ke na le toro ya aforika borwa moo ho tla ropoha toropo e kgolo ya pele e ntjhantjha e tla ahwa nakong ena ya puso ya demokrasi, ka meaho e mekato e mengata e yang hodimo, dikolo, diyunivesithi, dipetlele le difeme.
zul: kuyiphupho lami ukubona iningizimu afrika lapho kwakhiwa idolobha elisha sha esikhathini sombuso wentando yeningi labantu, elinamabhilidi amade, izikole, amanyuvesi, izibhedlela kanye namafemu.

sot: toro ena eo ke nang le yona e susumeditswe ke dipuisano tsa ka le batho ba bane ba bohlokwa: ngaka nkosazana dlamini zuma, ngaka naledi pandor, mofumahadi jessie duarte le moporesidente xi jinping wa china, eo tlhaloso ya hae ya kamoo china e ahang ka teng toropo e kgolo e ntjha dikhilomitareng tse 100 ho tloha beijing e thusitseng ka teng ho bopa toro ya ka.
zul: leli phupho lami ligqugquzelwe yingxoxo engibe nayo nabantu abanohlonze abanjengodkt nkosazana dlamini-zuma, dkt naledi pandor, nkz jessie duarte kanye nomongameli wase-china u-xi jinping, owathi uma engixoxela ngokuthi i-china imatasa yakha idolobha elisha ebangeni elingamakhilomitha ayi-100 kusuka edolobheni lase-beijing, wangenza ngibone ukuthi ngempela lingafezekiseka leli phupho lami.

sot: ena ke toro eo bohle re ka abelanang ka yona re be re kenye letsoho ho e aha.
zul: leli yiphupho okungaba ngelethu sonke futhi silifezekise ngempela.

sot: ha re eso ka re aha toropo e kgolo e ntjha dilemong tse 25 tsa puso ya demokrasi.
zul: eminyakeni eyi-25 leli lizwe libuswa ngentando yeningi labantu, asikaze sakhe idolobha elisha.

sot: maaforika borwa a etsang 75% a tla dula dibakeng tsa ditoropong ka 2030. ditoropo tse kgolo tsa johannesburg, tshwane, motse kapa le thekong di fellwa ke sebaka sa ho amohela bohle ba subuhlellanang ditoropong tse kgolo.
zul: bangama-75% abantu baseningizimu afrika abazobe sebehlala ezindaweni ezisemadolobheni ngowezi-2030.

sot: na ebe ha e so fihle nako ya rona hore re be sebete mme re qhomele dinaleding re etse ntho e bonahalang eka e ke ke ya kgoneha ho hang?
zul: amadolobha anjengegoli, i-tshwane, ikapa kanye netheku aseqala ukuphelelwa yindawo yokuhlalisa bonke abantu abafudukela ngobuningi emadolobheni.

sot: na ebe ha e so fihle nako ya ho aha toropo e kgolo e ntjha e radilweng ka ditheknoloji tsa 4ir?
zul: ingabe asikafiki yini isikhathi sokuthi sibonise isibindi futhi senze lokho ebesingacabangi neze ukuthi singaba namandla okukwenza?

sot: ke lakatsa ho mema maaforika borwa ohle hore a qale ho araburetsa tjhebelopele ena.
zul: ngithanda ukumema abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi baqale ukubona ngamehlo ukwakhiwa kwedolobha elinjengaleli.

sot: re setjhaba sa aforika borwa, seo ka molaotheo wa sona, se fanang ka tshepo ho ba se nang yona, ditokelo ho ba di amohilweng ba bile ba kotetswe, esita le ho phela ka boiketlo le tshireletso ho banna, basadi le bana ba yona.
zul: thina siyisizwe saseningizimu afrika, esikwaziyo ukuthi ngomthethosisekelo waso, sibuyise ithemba esimweni lapho belingasekho nelincane ithemba, esikwaziyo ukuhlinzeka ngamalungelo kubantu ababephucwe konke okungokwabo basala bengondinga sithebeni, futhi siyisizwe elikwaziyo ukuhlinzeka ngokunethezeka nokuvikeleka kubo bonke abantu balo, amadoda, abesifazane kanye nezingane.

sot: le haeba re kile ra tsherema, ha re e so lebale hore na re bomang, esita le seo re se emelang.
zul: nakuba kukhona lapho sihlulekile ukwenza izinto ngendlela efanele kanye nalapho siphelelwe khona wugqozi nofuqufuqu, asikazikhohlwa ukuthi singobani futhi asikakhohlwa ukuthi simeleni.

sot: re ntse re le setjhaba seo.
zul: siseyisona leso sizwe esishiwo ngenhla.

sot: le ka nna la botsa hore na ho etsahala ha jwang hore ke be le tshepo nakong e thata hakana.
zul: ungazibuza ukuthi ngingaba kanjani nethemba ezikhathini ezinzima njengalezi.

sot: ke na le tshepo hobane ke sebeditse le batho ba naha ena – baoki le basebeletsi ba tlhokomelo ya bophelo bo botle, mapolesa, matitjhere dikolong tsa rona, baithuti bao ebang ntle le maima a mahabo bona ba ikemiseditse ho atleha, le batjha ba lekang ho qala dikgwebo tsa bona, ho sibolla le ho thea, esita le ho phahamela mapoqo.
