zul: kunemiklamo eminingana eqhubekayo kakade kubandakanya ukuthuthukiswa kwesikhungo esisha ngabakwa-sasol e-boegoebaai enyakatho kapa, i-prieska power reserve efreyistata, kanye nomklamo wokukhiqiza ugesi ngehayidrojini, i-hydrogen valley initiative oqhutshwa e-limpopo, e-gauteng nakwazulu-natali.

sot: kapa leboya e se e hohetse kahodimo ho dibilione tse 100 tsa diranta ka matsete diprojekteng tsa motlakase o sa fehlweng ka peso ya mashala.
zul: isifundazwe sasenyakatho kapa sesihehe utshalomali olungaphezu kwezigidigidi eziyi-100 zamarandi olufakwe emiklamweni yamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo.

sot: matsete ana le a mang a maholohadi a etswang motlakaseng o sa fehlweng ka peso ya mashala a tla theha mesebetsi, mme a tla hlasimolla meruo ya dibaka, e seng feela kapa leboya, empa hape le kapa botjhabela, kapa bophirima le mpumalanga, moo ho tla fetolwa le lehwatata le omeletseng ka ho fetisisa hore le be mohlodi o moholohadi wa motlakase.
zul: le miklamo kanye neminye yotshalomali olufakwe emkhakheni wamandla kagesi ovuselelekayo izokwakha imisebenzi futhi ikhuthaze nokusimama kweminotho yendawo hhayi nje kuphela enyakatho kapa kodwa ngisho nasempumalanga kapa, entshonalanga kapa kanye nasempumalanga imbala, okuyinto ezoguqula ngisho ugwadule olome kakhulu lube yisikhondlakhondla somthombo wamandla kagesi.

sot: ho feta tsohle, phetohelo ya rona e lokileng e tla beha lenaneng le ka pele basebetsi le metse e dibakeng tsa diindasteri tse fokolang, e le ho netefatsa hore ho se ke ha ba le ya mong ya siuwang morao.
zul: ngaphezu kwakho konke, uguquko lwethu lokuguqukela emandleni kagesi ahlanzekile olunobuqotho nobulungiswa luzobeka eqhulwini abasebenzi kanye nemiphakathi esezimbonini ezisengcupheni ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi akekho noyedwa umuntu ozosala ngemuva.

sot: maafrika borwa a heso, moruo wa rona o tshwanela ho hola ka potlako haeba re tla fokotsa leqeme la mesebetsi ka mokgwa o kgotsofatsang.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, umnotho wethu kudingeka ukuthi ukhule ngesivinini esikhudlwana impela uma sifuna ukunciphisa ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi ngendlela ebonakalayo nephawulekayo.

sot: ho sona ya ngwahola, re ile ra bua ka morero wa rona wa ho theha selekane se akaretsang sa setjhaba molemong wa ho aha botjha moruo wa rona, mme re dumelle kgolo e phahamemg.
zul: kwi-sona ngonyaka odlule, sakhuluma ngenhloso yethu yokwakha isivumelwano esibanzi phakathi kukahulumeni nemiphakathi yonkana esabe sizohlanganisa bonke labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini ngaphansi kohlelo olulodwa lokwakha kabusha umnotho wethu kanye nokuvumela ukukhula okuphakeme.

sot: ha re ka ra ba le hona ho phetha selekane sa setjhaba kapele kamoo re neng re lakaditse ka lebaka la maemo a mangata a matjha a ileng a hlaha a ileng a baka hore ho be thata hore balekane ba setjhaba ba fihlelle tumellano.
zul: asikwazanga ukuphothula isivumelwano somphakathi wonkana ngesikhathi esabe silindelekile ngenxa yokuqubuka kwezimo ezintsha eziningana ezenza ukuthi kube nzima ukuthi kube nokuvumelana nabo bonke okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini.

sot: balekane ba setjhaba ba boletse morero wa bona wa ho theha selekane sa setjhaba le hore ba nnile ba tswela pele ho etsa moralo o tla dumella hore ho be le ketso e kopanetsweng dibakeng tsa bohlokwa tse kang motlakase, dipalangwang le ho thothwa ha thepa, ho thewa ha mesebetsi le ntshetsopele ya boitsebelo ba ho sebetsa, matsete le boitokisetso ba mebaraka e metjha, tshireletso ya setjhaba, ditlolo tsa molao le bobodu.
zul: labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathi bazwakalise inhloso yabo yokwenza isivumelwano nohulumeni futhi baqhubekile nomsebenzi wokwakha uhlaka oluzovumela ukuthatha izinyathelo ngokuhlanganyela emikhakheni emqoka njengokagesi, ezokuthutha nokuhanjiswa kwempahla, ukwakhiwa kwemisebenzi nokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono, utshalomali nokulungiswa ngokuphelele kwemikhiqizo yezimbiwa neminye ngaphakathi kuleli, ukuvikelwa komphakathi, ubugebengu kanye nenkohlakalo.

sot: le ha re ntse re ikemiseditse hakaalo ka boitlamo ba ho theha tumellano e ntjha pakeng tsa makala ohle a setjhaba sa rona, re boetse re entse hore ho be teng tshebetsommoho e sebetsang dibakeng tse ding tse itseng.
zul: ngenkathi sisalokhu sizibophezele ekwakheni ukuvumelana okusha phakathi kwayo yonke imikhakha yomphakathi wethu, siphinde futhi sathatha izinyathelo eziphathekayo zokubambisana ezindaweni ezithile.

sot: re a bo bona boitlamo ba balekane bohle ba setjhaba dilekaneng tse ileng tsa thehelwa ho lwantsha sewa sa covid-19, mme ba atlehisa lenaneo le leholo ka ho fetisisa la kentelo nalaneng ya rona.
zul: kunezinye izivumelwano eziningana esizenzile nalabo esibambisene nabo emphakathini.

sot: re bo bone mererong e tshwanang le letlole la mahatammoho le ileng la kenya letsholong setjhaba, baitseki ba setjhaba, le matlole a ditjhelete, molemong wa ho atlehisa merero e kopanetsweng, le merero ya bolekane ya ho fedisa tshebediso ya dikgoka e lebisitsweng ho ba batshehadi le polao ya ba batshehadi (gbvf), le ho arabela ditlamorao tsa diphetoho tsa boemo ba lehodimo.
zul: siyakubona ukuzibophezela kwabo bonke labo okubanjiswene nabo emphakathini ezivumelwaneni ezenziwe ngenhloso yokulwisana nobhubhane lwe-covid-19 kanye nokuqhuba uhlelo lokugoma olungolukhulukazi emlandweni wethu.

sot: re bone ditholwana tsa katamelo ena ya ho kgothaletsa matsete le ho ntshetsa pele meralo e meholo makaleng a moruo, a kang lekala la ho etswa ha dikoloi, la diaparo le masela, la bommaditshibana, la tswekere, la temo le la ditshebeletso tsa matjhaba tsa kgwebo.
zul: sizibonile izinhlelo ezinjengesikhwama sobumbano ezigqugquzele umphakathi, zakhuthaza ubushoshovu bezakhamuzi futhi zanxenxa uxhasomali ukuze kufezekiswe izinhloso ezifanayo, futhi okuyizinhlelo ezenziwe ngobambiswano okuhloswe ngalo ukuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile kanye nokubulawa kwabantu besifazane (i-gbvf), kanye nokubhekana ngqo nemithelela yokuguquguquka kwesimo sezulu.

sot: meralo ena e meholo e seng e ile ya pethwa, e tshehetsa tsosoloso ya makala a amehang, nyehelo ya matsete e etswang ke lekala la poraefete le ho thewa ha mesebetsi e metjha le boiphediso ba baahi.
zul: siyibonile imihlomulo yale ndlela yokusebenza ekugqugquzeleni utshalomali kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezinhlelo-ngqangi emikhakheni yomnotho enjengomkhakha wezimoto, owezingubo zokugqoka nendwangu, owezinkukhu, okashukela, owezolimo kanye nowezinsizakalo zebhizinisi zomhlaba wonke.

sot: re thabisitswe ke hore balekane ba setjhaba, haholoholo borakgwebo, haesale ba ntse ba fana ka tshehetso bakeng la ho phethahatsa moralo o sebetsang wa motlakase, ka maikutlo a ho etsa selekane sa setjhaba.
zul: izinhlelo-ngqangi eseziphothuliwe zeseka ukuvuselelwa kabusha kwaleyo mikhakha ethintekile, nokufakwa kotshalomali okwenziwa ngabomkhakha ozimele kanye nokwakhiwa kwemisebenzi emisha kanye nezindlela zokuziphilisa.

sot: ka mokgwa o tshwanang, re thehile bolekane bo sebetsang ba rona le basebetsi le setjhaba molemong wa ho tshehetsa dikarolo tse ding tsa karabelo ya tsietsi ya motlakase.
zul: kuyasithokozisa ukubona ukuthi labo esibambisene nabo emphakathini, ikakhulukazi abamabhizinisi, bebelokhu behlinzeka ngokweseka ukuqaliswa kohlelo lokusebenza lwamandla kagesi ngokomoya wobambiswano nokwenziwa kwezivumelwano phakathi kukahulumeni nezinhlaka zomphakathi wonkana.

sot: jwalo ka ha motlakase o hlokeha haholo bakeng sa kgolo ya moruo, ho jwalo feela le ka phepelo ya metsi e tshepahalang le sistimi e sebetsang hantle ya dipalangwang, mmoho le metheo ya tshebetso ya mebila.
zul: ngokufanayo, sesakhe ubambiswano nensebenziswano eqinile nabasebenzi ngokunjalo futhi nomphakathi ekusekeleni eminye imikhakha yezinhlelo zokubhekana nenkinga yamandla kagesi.

sot: marangrang a rona a diterene a bile tsietsing ya dilemo tse ngata tsa matsete a fokolang, ho se hlokomelwe, diketso tsa ditlolo tsa molao le ho se sebetse hantle.
zul: njengoba amandla kagesi ebalulekile ekukhuleni komnotho, kubalulekile futhi nokutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi kanye nohlelo lwezokuthutha olusebenza kahle kanye nengqalasizinda yomgwaqo.

sot: ho rarolla bothata bona, ngwahola, re ile ra amohela leano la naha la diterene la ho tataisa, ho ntjhafatswa le ho fetolwa ha lekala la diterene, ho lokisetswa, hara tse ding, hore marangrang a rona a diterene a kgone ho sebediswa le ke tse ding diterene tseo e seng tsa transnet.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokuthutha ngezitimela lukhahlamezekile ngenxa yeminyaka eminingi kungatshalwa izimali kulona ngendlela efanele, ungenziwa nomsebenzi wokulungisa, nezenzo zobugebengu kanye nokungaqhutshwa neze kahle komsebenzi.

sot: re le mmuso, ka mafapha ohle a rona a amehang, re sebeletsa ho theha leano la transnet le tla fetolela boitlamo ba rona ba maano hore bonneteng, ho kenyeletswa ho hlophiswa botjha ha diterene tsa transnet tsa thepa, ho thewe molaodi ya ka thoko wa metheo ya tshebetso bakeng sa marangrang a diterene pele ho kgwedi ya mphalane selemong sena sa 2023. transnet e tla phetha bolekane le dikhampani tsa lekala la poraefete ditheminaleng tsa ditshelo tsa durban le ngqura, ho thusana le matsete a matjha dibakeng tsa rona tsa boemakepe le ho ntlafatsa tshebetso e ntle.
zul: ngenhloso yokubhekana ngqo nalokhu, ngonyaka odlule, samukela inqubomgomo kazwelonke yezezitimela ukuze isihole ekwenzeni umkhakha wezitimela ube ngowesimanjemanje futhi kulethwe uguquko kuwona, kuhlinzekwe, phakathi kokunye, ngokufinyelela kwezikhungo nezinkampani ezingaphandle kukahulumeni ohlelweni lwethu lokuthutha ngezitimela.

sot: sena se tla thusa dibaka tsa rona tsa boemakepe hore di tsebe ho boela di fumana boemo ba tsona jwalo ka tse ding tsa dibaka tsa boemakepe tse sebetsang hantle ka ho fetisisa jwalo ka ha ho kile ha eba jwalo.
zul: kuhulumeni wonkana sisebenzela ukuthuthukisa umhlahlandlela wakwa-transnet ozoguqula izibophezelo zenqubomgomo yethu zibe yinto eyenzekayo, ephathekayo futhi ebonakalayo, kubandakanya ukuhlelwa kabusha komkhakha wakwa-transnet wokuthuthwa kwempahla ngezitimela ukuze kwakhiwe umphathi wengqalasizinda oseceleni ozoqondana ngqo nohlelo lokuthutha ngezitimela ngaphambi kokuphela kukamfumfu 2023. u-transnet kanye nezinkampani zomkhakha ozimele bazokwenza izivumelwano zokubambisana nokusebenzisana esikhumulweni semikhumbi sasethekwini nesasengqura, ukuze kuvunyelwe ukungena kotshalomali olusha emachwebeni ethu futhi kuphuculwe nendlela aqhuba ngayo umsebenzi.

sot: ho se ho bile le katleho e kgolo ho busetseng theminale ya port elizabeth ya dikoloi, eo jwale e menahantseng mothamo wa yona ka makgetlo a fetang a mabedi, mme e se e bile e fumane keketseho ya diromelwantle.
zul: lokhu kuzolekelela amachweba ethu ukuthi abuyele endaweni abekuyo emhlabeni ngokuthi aphinde athathwe njengamanye amachweba awuqhuba ngobunyoninco obukhulu umsebenzi wawo.

sot: dikoloi di eketsehile haholo tse romelwang mebarakeng ya mose ho mawatle tse tshediswang di tloha theminaleng ya dikoloi ya port elizabeth.
zul: inkulu kakhulu impumelelo ezuziwe emsebenzini wokuguqula isimo sokusebenza kwesikhumulo sezimoto sase-port elizabeth, esesiwuphindaphinde kabili umthamo waso futhi osekuqalile kusona ukubonakala komthamo ophakeme wemikhiqizo ethunyelwa emazweni angaphandle.

sot: transnet e boetse e tsosolosa diterene tsa yona tse sa sebetseng, hape e reka diterene tse ntjha.
zul: likhulile impela inani lezimoto ezithunyelwa ezimakethe zaphesheya eziphuma esikhumulweni sezimoto sase-port elizabeth.

sot: re nnile ra shebana le diphephetso ha re thotha baeti ditereneng tsa bapalami.
zul: futhi u-transnet wenza umsebenzi wokulungisa nokuvuselela izitimela ebezihleli zingasebenzi futhi ukhulisa nenani lezitimela zakhe.

sot: ho latela ho hlophiswa botjha ho ntseng ho tswela pele hona jwale lekaleng la diterene la bapalami la afrika borwa, diporo tse 13 tsa diterene tsa baeti di se di butswe, mme di fokoleditse haholo basebetsi ba bangata ditshenyehelo tsa maeto.
zul: besibhekene nezinselele kwezokuthuthwa kwabagibeli ngezitimela.

sot: phepelo e tshepahalang ya metsi ke ya bohlokwa haholo bakeng sa boiphediso ba batho le bakeng sa kgolo ya moruo wa rona.
zul: ukutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi kusemqoka kakhulu kwinhlalakahle yabantu kanye nasekukhuleni komnotho wethu.

sot: ho netefatsa polokeho ya metsi hona jwale le ka moso, lefapha la metsi le tsamaiso ya dikgwerekgwere le eteletse pele tshebetso ya ho tsetela diprojekteng tsa sehlooho naheng ka bophara.
zul: ukuqinisekisa ukutholakala kwamanzi ngaso sonke isikhathi, manje nasesikhathini esizayo, umnyango wezamanzi nokuthuthwa kwendle uhola inqubo yokutshalwa kwezimali emiklamweni yengqalasizinda emikhulukazi ezweni lonkana.

sot: kamorao ho tiehiso ya dilemo tse ngata, mesebetsi e phethahetseng ya kaho ya projekte ya mohato wa bobedi wa dihlaba tsa lesotho o tla qalwa selemong sena.
zul: emuva kokubambezeleka iminyaka eminingana, kulo nyaka uzoqaliswa ngokuphelele futhi umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwesigaba sesibili somklamo we-lesotho highlands.

sot: projekte ya dihlaba ya lesotho ke ya bohlokwa bakeng la ho netefatsa polokeho ya phepelo ya metsi gauteng, freistata, mpumalanga, leboya bophirima le kapa leboya.
zul: umklamo we-lesotho highlands usemqoka kakhulu ekuqinisekiseni ukuphakelwa kwamanzi e-gauteng, efreyistata, empumalanga, enyakatho ntshonalanga kanye nasenyakatho kapa.

sot: dilemo tse mashomeshome kamora hore e sisinngwe, le dilemo tse robong kamora mokete wa ho e phetholela lekote, mohato wa pele wa projekte ya mzimvubu ya metsi o tla qala selemong se tlang sa ditjhelete.
zul: emuva kwamashuminyaka ambadlwana kwenziwa isiphakamiso futhi emuva kweminyaka eyisishiyagalolunye kwabanjwa umcimbi wokuphendula isoyi, isigaba sokuqala somklamo wamanzi i-umzimvubu water project sizoqaliswa kulo nyakamali ozayo.

sot: mohato ona, o akgang ho ahuwa ha letamo la ntabelanga, metheo ya tshebetso ya nosetso le phepelo ya metsi ho ya metseng, e tla tshehetswa ke mmuso ka ditjhelete.
zul: lesi sigaba, esibandakanya ukwakhiwa kwedamu i-ntabelanga dam, nengqalasizinda yokuchelela kanye nokuthunyelwa kwamanzi emiphakathini, sizoxhaswa ngezimali nguhulumeni.

sot: mohato o latelang e tla ba wa ho ahuwa ha letamo la lilane, le tla kenyeletsa seteishene sa motlakase o fehlwang ka matla a metsi.
zul: isigaba esilandelayo kuzoba wukwakhiwa kwedamu i-lilane dam, elizobandakanya nesiteshi esiphehla amandla kagesi ngamanzi.

sot: diprojekte tse kgolo tsa ho eketsa mothamo wa letamo la clanwilliam, letamo la hazelmere le letamo la tzaneen di tla ntlafatsa phepelo ya metsi ho ya lebopong le ka bophirima, ethekwini le karolo e ka botjhabela ya limpopo.
zul: imiklamo emikhulukazi yokukhuphula umthamo wamadamu i-clanwilliam dam, ne-hazelmere dam kanye ne-tzaneen dam izokwenza ngcono ukuphakelwa kwamanzi ogwini olusentshonalanga, ethekwini kanye nasengxenyeni esempumalanga ye-limpopo.

sot: selemong se fetileng, re phatlaladitse moralo o moholo wa phetoho ya tshohanyetso wa ho nolofatsa tshebetso ya dikopo tsa dilaksense tsa tshebediso ya metsi, e leng ya bohlokwa ho thusa ho tlisa matsete a managata.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, samemezela uhlelo olubanzi lokuguqula isimo okuhloswe ngalo ukuhlela kabusha inqubo yezicelo zamalayisensi okusebenzisa amanzi, okuyinto esemqoka ekungeniseni utshalomali oluthe xaxa.

sot: ho tloha hona hoo, re suthisitse tshallomorao ya ho ntshuwa ha dilaksense tsa tshebediso ya metsi, hape ra fokotsa nako ya ho emela phumantsho ya dilaksense, ra e theolela ho matsatsi a 90. lenaneo la rona la kaho ya metheo ya tshebetso le fumana ho potlaka ka thuso ya letlole la metheo ya tshebetso le metheo ya tshebetso ya afrika borwa, e thehetsweng ho tshehetsa diprojekte tse kgolo tsa metheo ya tshebetso.
zul: kusukela lapho, sesikuqedile ukusalela emuva komsebenzi wokukhishwa kwamalayisensi okusebenzisa amanzi futhi sabunciphisa nobude besikhathi sezicelo sayofinyelela ezinsukwini ezingama-90.

sot: ho lokisa hona, metheo ya tshebetso ya afrika borwa e abetswe dimilione tse 600 tsa diranta bakeng la boitokisetso ba projekte, bakeng sa dibaka tsa mahaeng le tse fokollwang ke disebediswa.
zul: uhlelo lwethu lokwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda seluqala ukuhamba ngesivinini esikhulu impela ngenxa yomsebenzi owenziwa yisikhwama sengqalasizinda kanye nesikhungo sezengqalasizinda saseningizimu afrika, i-infrastructure south africa, okuyisikhungo esisungulelwe ukweseka imiklamo yengqalasizinda ekhethekile.

sot: ditshebetso tsa tshehetso le meralo tseo re di kentseng tshebetsong dilemong tse ngata tse fetileng di se di qadile ho beha ditholwana jwale ka mokgwa wa matsete a mmuso a eketsehileng metheong ya tshebetso.
zul: esinye sezithiyo ezinkulukazi kutshalomali lwengqalasizinda wukuntuleka kwamakhono obungoti bomsebenzi kanye namandla okuphathwa kwemiklamo.

sot: ho fihlela ka pherekgong selemong sena, diprojekte tsa boleng ba dibilione tse 232 tsa diranta di ne di ne di se di ahuwa, mme diprojekte tsa boleng bo batlang bo etsa dibilione tse 4 tsa diranta di ne di se di phethilwe.
zul: ukuze kulungiswe lokhu, i-infrastructure south africa yabelwe isamba esiyizigidi ezingama-600 zamarandi okuyimali eqondiswe emsebenzini wokulungiselelwa kwemiklamo, ikakhulukazi ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nezindawo ezingenazo kahle izinsiza.

sot: diprojekte tse phethilweng di kenyeletsa kaho ya matlo a matjha a bodulo gauteng, ntlafatso ya mebila le ntshetsopele ya dikou tse nyenyane.
zul: izindlela zokweseka nokuhlela esizisungulile esaziqalisa kule minyakana embadlwana edlule manje seziqala ukubonisa izithelo ezinhle njengoba sekubonakala ukukhula kotshalomali lukahulumeni kwingqalasizinda.

sot: ntshetsopeleng e kgolo, lekala la afrika borwa la mebila ya naha – sanral – le abile dikonteraka tsa kaho ya mebila tsa boleng ba dibilione tse 18 tsa diranta nakong ya dikgwedi tse tharo tse fetileng.
zul: ngomasingana kulo nyaka, iyisamba esiyizigidigidi ezingama-232 zamarandi imiklamo eyakhiwayo kanti futhi beseyiphothuliwe imiklamo ebalelwa kwisamba esiyizigidigidi ezine zamarandi.

sot: kaho ya borokgo ba msikaba le borokgo ba mtentu e tla qetwa, mme e etse hore maeto a kapa botjhabela a nolofale haholo.
zul: imiklamo esiphothuliwe ibandakanya imiklamo yezindlu ezintsha zokuhlalisa abantu e-gauteng, imiklamo yokulungiswa nokuthuthukiswa kwemigwaqo kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwamachweba amancane.

sot: matsete ana a tla tswela indasteri ya kaho molemo o moholo, hape a dumella ho thewa ha mesebetsi e mengata, ntshetsopele ya bokgoni le kimollo ya bofutsana, haholoholo metseng ya mahae e haufi le dibaka tsena.
zul: maqondana nemiklamo yentuthuko emikhulu, isikhungo sezemigwaqo sakuleli, i-south african national roads agency – i-sanral – sesihlinzeke ngezinkontileka zokwakhiwa kwemigwaqo zenani eliyizigidigidi eziyi-18 zamarandi kule zinyanga ezintathu ezedlule.

sot: ngwahola, re itse re tla eketsa kaho ya marokgo a metseng ya mahae e le karolo ya lenaneo la welisizwe, ho thusa baahi hore ba finyelle dikolong ka bonolo le ka polokeho, le dibakeng tsa mesebetsi le tsa ditshebeletso.
zul: umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwebhuloho imsikaba bridge kanye nebhuloho imtentu bridge uzophothulwa futhi uzokwenza kube ngcono kakhulu ukuhamba empumalanga kapa.

sot: marokgo a 24 a kwazulu-natal a a ahuwa hona jwale, mme ho lokiswa ha ditsha ho tswela pele bakeng la marokgo a mang a 24. lekaleng la dikgokahanyo, ho phethwa ha thekiso ya setjhabeng ya maqhubu a pharaletseng ho butse matsete a matjha, mme ha kenya dibilione tse 14 tsa diranta bajeteng ya naha.
zul: lolu tshalomali luzohlomulisa kakhulu imboni yezokwakha futhi luvumele ukwakhiwa kwemisebenzi eminingi, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono kanye nokuxosha indlala, ikakhulukazi emiphakathini yezindawo zasemakhaya eziseduzane.

sot: boleleleng ba selemo sena, re tla tshedisetsa malapa a setseng ho leqhubu la thelevishene ya digithale, mme re phethe ho tingwa ha phetiso ya analog.
zul: ngonyaka odlule sathi sizowukhulisa umsebenzi wokwakhiwa kwamabhuloho ezindaweni zasemakhaya njengengxenye yohlelo iwelisizwe, ukuze silekelele abahlali bakwazi ukufinyelela kalula futhi ngokuphepha ezikoleni, emsebenzini kanye nasezikhungweni ezisemqoka.

sot: hona ho tla fana ka maqhubu a bohlokwa bakeng la ho thakgolwa ha marangrang a mehala ya 5g, hape ho tla fokotsa ditjeo tsa datha.
zul: angama-24 amabhuloho akhiwayo njengamanje kwazulu-natali futhi uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokulungiswa kwezizinda okuzokwakhiwa kuzona amanye amabhuloho angama-24.

sot: mehato ena e tla re atametsa haufi le pono ya rona ya phumantsho ya inthanete e fihlellehang, le e lebelo le phahamemng.
zul: emkhakheni wezokuxhumana ngobuchwepheshe, ukuphothulwa kwendali yamagagasi omoya obuchwepheshe bezokuxhumana (spectrum) sekuvule amathuba otshalomali olusha futhi sekufake imali eyizigidigidi eziyi-14 zamarandi emgodlagodleni wezimali kahulumeni.

sot: ho sona ya ngwahola, re itse re tla tsepamisa maikutlo a rona hodima matsapa a rona a ho bokella maemo a hodimo a matsete, e leng ntho ya bohlokwa ho hodiseng moruo le ho theheng mesebetsi.
zul: ngokuqhubeka kwalo nyaka, sizofudusela amakhaya asele kwisiginali kamabonakude wedijithali futhi siphothule nenqubo yokucinywa kwesiginali kamabonakude osakaza nge-analogi.

sot: re itse re tla fana ka tshusumetso letsholong leo re ileng ra kena ho lona dilemong tse ka bang hlano tse fetileng la ho hlahisa ditrilione tse 1.2 tsa diranta ka mokgwa wa matsete a matjha.
zul: lokhu kuzokhulula amagagasi omoya obuchwepheshe bezokuxhumana ayigugu kakhulu ukuze asetshenziselwe ukukhishwa kwamanethiwekhi e-5g omakhalekhukhwini futhi kuzonciphisa izindleko zedatha.

sot: selemong se fetileng, seboka sa bone sa matsete sa afrika borwa (saic) se fumane dibilione tse 367 tsa diranta ka mokgwa wa boitlamo ba matsete, sa re fa tshepo ya hore pakana ya rona ya matsete ya dilemo tse hlano re tla e fihlela.
zul: ku-sona ngonyaka odlule, sathi sizogxilisa imizamo yethu ekugqugquzeleni amazinga aphakame otshalomali, okuyinto esemqoka ekukhuliseni umnotho nokwakha imisebenzi.

sot: boleleleng ba selemo se fetileng, bongata ba diketso tsena tsa boitlamo bo fihleletse moo bongata ba dikhampani tseo tse ileng tsa etsa boitlamo di tsetetseng difektring tse ntjha, ditsing tsa mohala, difektring tsa motlakase wa sola, mehaleng e tsamayang ka tlasa lewatle ya faeba, ho atollweng ha metjha ya tlhahiso le kamohelong ya ditheknoloji tse ntjha.
zul: sathi sizofaka umfutho emkhankasweni esawuqalisa cishe eminyakeni emihlanu edlule wokuthola nokunxenxa utshalomali olusha olungamathriliyoni angu-1.2 amarandi.

sot: ntlheng ya bohlokwa, matsete ana a hlahisitse mesebetsi e metjha le menyetla e metjha bakeng sa dikgwebo tse nyenyane tse ntseng di hola.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ingqungquthela yesine yotshalomali yaseningizimu afrika, (i-saic) yathola izithembiso zotshalomali oluyisamba esiyizigidigidi ezingama-367 zamarandi, okuyinto ewakhuphule kakhulu amathuba okufezekisa umgomo weminyaka emihlanu wotshalomali okuhloswe ukufinyelela kuwona.

sot: sebokeng sena, re tla beha pakana e ntjha ya ho bokella, ka mokgwa wa matsete, ka hodimo ho trilione tse 2 tsa diranta, ho ya selemong sa 2028. matsete a seng a kene moruong ona ho fihlela kajeno a se a fane ka nyehelo e eketsehileng haholo tlhahisong ya naha.
zul: kulo nyaka odlule, eziningi zalezi zibophezelo ziholele ekutheni izinkampani ezenze lezo zibophezelo zitshale izimali emafemini amasha, izizinda ezamukela izingcingo, izikhungo zikagesi welanga, amakhebuli ezokuxhumana ahamba ngaphansi kolwandle, ukwandiswa kwezizinda zokukhiqiza kanye nokwamukelwa nokusetshenziswa kobuchwepheshe obusha.

sot: matsete ana a kgothaleditse matsapa a rona a ho reka dihlahiswa tsa ka hare ho naha.
zul: okusemqoka kakhulu, lolu tshalomali seluholele emisebenzini emisha kanye namathuba amasha emabhizinisini amancane asafufusa.

sot: haeba o ya sepetlele o ilo buuwa, monyetla ke wa hore o tla fuwa moriana o o robatsang o hlahisitsweng setsheng sa maemo a hodimo sa eastern cape.
zul: kusihlwa nje, ngiphuza amanzi ngengilazi eyenziwe e-wadeville ngeviki eledlule ngabasebenzi abavela e-katlehong, e-vosloorus nase-germiston.

sot: nakong ya ketelo ya ka ya semmuso united kingdom selemong se fetileng, feme ya afrika borwa e ile ya fumana laksense ya ho hlahisa ente e rothetswang ka hanong ya kholera kgetlo la pele mona afrika borwa.
zul: besekuphele iminyaka ngeminyaka iningizimu afrika izithenga emazweni angaphandle izingilazi zokuphuza.

sot: ditumellano tsa ho kopanya dikhampani tse hlodisanang di entse mokgwa wa hore ho tle ho be le mafura a mangata a tla hlwekiswa ka hare ho naha, le hore ho eketsehe dijo tse tla rekwa ho balemi ba mona afrika borwa.
zul: uma uya esibhedlela uyohlizwa, makhulu amathuba okuthi uthole izidambisizinhlungu ezenziwe esikhungweni sokukhiqiza esisezingeni lomhlaba esisempumalanga kapa.

sot: ngwahola, re entse boitlamo ba ho bulela matsete lekaleng la hempe le matekwane.
zul: ohambweni lwami olusemthethweni lokuvakashela e-united kingdom ngonyaka odlule, ifemu yaseningizimu afrika yathola ilayisensi yokukhiqiza umgomo wesifo sohudo (ikholera) ophuzwayo okungokokuqala ngqa lapha eningizimu afrika.

sot: re se re ntse re sebeletsa ho etsa maemo a tla dumella hore lekala lena le hole.
zul: izivumelwano zokuhlanganiswa kwamabhizinisi abe yinkampani eyodwa sezihlinzekele ukuthi imikhiqizo kawoyela engeziwe ilungiswe futhi icwengwe kuleli futhi nokudla okuthe xaxa kuthengwe kubalimi bakuleli.

sot: lefapha la temo, diphetoho tsa mobu le ntshetsopele ya dibaka tsa mahae, mmoho le lefapha la bophelo, a tla sebetsana le maemo a renang ha jwale bakeng la temo ya hempe le matekwane e le ho dumella temo ya kantle le pokello ya kotulo ho tswa ho balemi ba setso.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sazibophezela ekuvuleni amathuba otshalomali emkhakheni wemikhiqizo yensangu.

sot: sena se tla bula tshebetso e kgolo ya moruo dibakeng tsa naha ya rona tsa mahaeng, haholoholo kapa botjhabela, kwazulu-natal le mpumalanga.
zul: umnyango wezolimo, izinguquko kwezomhlaba kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya kanye nomnyango wezempilo izolungisa udaba lwezimo ezikhona njengamanje maqondana nokutshalwa kwensangu ukuze kuvunyelwe ukutshalwa kwayo ngaphandle kwezakhiwo kanye nokuqoqwa kwezivuno kubalimi bendabuko.

sot: mosebetsi o potlakileng o se o le mathuleng a ho phethwa ke mmuso ho theha moralo wa taolo e nolofatsang bakeng la kgwebo yohle, dikatamelo tsohle tsa merero e molaong bakeng la meriana e tlatsetsang, dijo, ditlolo, le dihlahiswa tsa indasteri, ho ntse ho ikamahantswe le ditumellano tsa matjhaba le ditlwaelo tse molemo ka ho fetisisa.
zul: lokhu kuzovula amathuba amakhulukazi omnotho ezindaweni zasemakhaya zakuleli, ikakhulukazi empumalanga kapa, kwazulu-natali nasempumalanga.

sot: hona ho kenyeletsa ho hlophiswa botjha ha dibajete tsa mafapha bakeng la ntshetsopele le tshehetso ya lekala la setso, balemi ba batsho, le tekanyo ya tshebetso ya saps le diphetoho tsa taolo.
zul: uhulumeni uphothula umsebenzi ophuthumayo ukuze kwakhiwe uhlaka lwemithetho elawulayo oluzovumela ukusetshenziswa kwemikhiqizo yesihlahla sonke ngokuphelele, nendlela yokusebenza ezovumela imisebenzi evumelekile ukuze isihlahla sisetshenziselwe ukwakha imithi, ukudla, izimonyo, kanye nemikhiqizo yezimboni, ngokuhambisana nezivumelwano zamazwe ngamazwe kanye nezinkambiso ezingungqaphambili.

sot: seboka sa thakgolo ya boradiindasteri ba batsho sa kgwedi ya phupu selemong se fetileng se bontshitse dikatleho tsa maafrika borwa a matsho tlhahisong ya dijo, dikarolo tsa dikoloi, thepa ya katlung, diaparo, setala, dikhemikhale le dihlahiswa tsa merafo, e leng moo ho hlahiswang diketekete tsa mesebetsi, hape ho hodiswa sehlahiswa se seholo sa naha.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukwabiwa kabusha kwezabelomali zeminyango ukuze kuthuthukiswe lo mkhakha futhi kwesekwe abalimi bendabuko, abamnyama, futhi kuhanjelaniswe nomsebenzi we-saps wokuphoqelela ukuthotshelwa komthetho nezinguquko zokulawula.

sot: jwalo ka mohlala wa matla a theknoloji a bodiindasteri bana, e mong wa bahlodi ba fumaneng dikgau sebokeng sena e bile astrifica technologies, khampani e thehilweng mmoho le e mong ke mosadi e motsho, jessie ndaba, e fanang ka ditharollo tsa datha malebana le tshebetso ya disathelaete.
zul: ingqungquthela yokuqala yosozimboni abamnyama eyabanjwa ngontulikazi ngonyaka odlule yabonisa impumelelo yabantu abamnyama baseningizimu afrika ekukhiqizeni ukudla, izingxenye zezimoto, ifenisha, izingubo zokugqoka, insimbi, amakhemikhali kanye nemikhiqizo yezimayini, osekudale izinkulungwane eziningi zemisebenzi futhi kwafaka isandla kwisambamkhiqizo sezwe.

sot: re entse tswelopele selemong sena se fetileng ka ho fumana katleho ya maemo a phahameng a ho ba borathepa ha basebetsi moruong ona.
zul: manje sesinosozimboni abamnyama ababalelwa kwabayi-1 000 ababambe iqhaza ohlelweni losozimboni abamnyama.

sot: jwale tjena ho na le basebetsi ba fetang 400 000 ba nang le dikarolo tsa thuo difemeng tseo ba di sebeletsang.
zul: njengesibonelo sekhono lezobuchwepheshe elimangalisayo losozimboni labo, enye inkampani eyahlabana ngendondo kule ngqungquthela yi-astrofica technologies, okuyinkampani eyasungulwa ngokubambisana ngowesifazane omnyama, u-jessie ndaba, ohlinzeka ngezinsiza zedatha yokusetshenziswa kwamasathelayithi.

sot: kgolo le tlhahiso ya mesebetsi moruong ona e tla atlehiswa ke dikgwebo tse nyenyane le tse mahareng, dikopanele le dikgwebo tse sa rerwang.
zul: kulo nyaka odlule, senze inqubekela phambili ekufezekiseni amazinga aphakeme obunikazi bomnotho kubantu abamnyama.

sot: selemong se fetileng, re thakgotse sekema sa tshohanyetso sa kadimo ya ditjhelete se tsamaisong ya dibanka le mekgatlo e meng ya ditjhelete, mme se netefaletswa ke mmuso, bakeng la dikhampani tse hlokang thuso ya ditjhelete hore di tsosoloswe ka baka la ditlamorao tsa sewa.
zul: ukukhula nokwakhiwa kwemisebenzi emnothweni wethu kuzoqhutshwa ngamabhizinisi asafufusa, imifelandawonye kanye namabhizinisi angahlelekile.

sot: lefapha la ntshetsopele ya dikgwebo tse nyenyane le tla sebetsa mmoho le ramatlotlo wa naha malebana le hore na sekema sena se ka matlafatswa jwang ho thusa dikgwebo tse nyenyane le tse mahareng le dikgwebo tse lekaleng le sa rerwang.
zul: ngonyaka odlule sethula uhlelo lokubolekisa ngemali kumabhizinisi akhahlamezekile ukuze ashaye ibuya, olulawulwa ngamabhange nezinye izikhungo zezimali, futhi oluqinisekiswe nguhulumeni, ukuze kulekelelwe izinkampani ezidinga ukuxhaswa ngezimali ukuba zivuke kwimithelela yobhubhane.

sot: ho sebtsana le phephetso ya kgaello ya mesebetsi ya batjha, moropotso wa kgafa ya kgiro o atolotswe molemong wa ho kgothaletsa dikgwebo ho hira manane a maholo ho feta a batjha.
zul: umnyango wezokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi amancane uzosebenzisana nomgcinimafa kazwelonke maqondana nokuthi luzoqiniswa kanjani lolu hlelo ukuze kulekelelwe amabhizinisi asafufusa kanye namabhizinisi asemkhakheni ongahlelekile.

sot: ngwahola, ke ile ka phatlalatsa hore re tla leka ho fokotsa mafito a ditshebetsong tsa mmuso e le hore re tle re fedise tiehiso e sa hlokahaleng.
zul: ukuze kubhekwane nenselele yokuntuleka kwemisebenzi entsheni, seluliwe isibonelelo-sikhuthazo sentela yokuqasha ngenhloso yokukhuthaza amabhinizinisi ukuthi aqashe abantu abasha abaningi.

sot: sehlopha sa phokotso ya mafito a ditshebeletsong tsa mmuso, tlasa boetapele ba ntate sipho nkosi, se se se ntse se sebetsa le mafapha a fapafapaneng ho etsa hore ho be bobebe ho etsa mosebetsi.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngamemezela ukuthi sihlose ukunciphisa izinqubo zemidanti nemicikilisho eminingi kwinkambiso kahulumeni ukuze kuqedwe ukubambezeleka okungenasidingo ezweni lethu okuvamise ukuvimbela inqubekelaphambili esheshayo.

sot: ho ile ha qosa hore ho be teng katamelo ya tshebetsommoho, moo ho sebetswang le mafapha le makala dibakeng tse kang tsa sistimi ya ditokelo tsa barafi, dilaksenseng tsa borakgwebo ba dipalangwang lekaleng la bohahlaodi, di-visa le ditumello tsa mosebetsi, dikolo tsa dikonyana le lekala le sa rerwang.
zul: ithimba lokuncishiswa kwezinkambiso ezibambezelayo elizinze ehhovisi likamongameli eliholwa ngumnu sipho nkosi belilokhu lisebenzisana neminyango ehlukahlukene ukwenza kube lula ukwenza ibhizinisi.

sot: selemong sena, re tla phetha ditokiso tsa molao wa kgwebo wa 1991 (molao wa 71 wa selemo sa 1991) ho fokotsa ditshitiso tsa taolo ya dikgwebo tse nyenyane, tse mahareng le tse nyenyane haholo (di-smme) le ditshebedisano, mme ho etswe hore ho be bonolo ho borakgwebo ho qala dikgwebo.
zul: lokhu kulandele indlela yokusebenza ngokubambisana, ngokuthi kusetshenziswane neminyango kanye nezikhungo zikahulumeni emikhakheni enjengohlelo lwamalungelo okumba ezimayini, amalayisensi abaqhubi bamabhizinisi ezokuthutha kwezokuvakasha, ama-visa nezimvume zokusebenza, ukuthuthukiswa kwezingane ezisencane kanye nomkhakha ongahlelekile.

sot: ka lekala la ditjhelete la dikgwebo tse nyenyane – re rerile ho nehelana ka dibilione tse 1.4 tsa diranta ho thusa borakgwebo ba fetang 90 000. mmuso, bolekaneng le letlole la afrika borwa la di-smme o tshwarahane le ho theha letlole la dibilione tse 10 tsa diranta ho tshehetsa kgolo ya di-smme.
zul: kulo nyaka, sizophothula izichibiyelo zomthetho wezamabhizinisi, we-1991 (umthetho wama-71 we-1991) ukuze kuncishiswe izithiyo zokulawula kumabhizinizisi asafufusa (ama-smme) kanye nemifelandawonye futhi kwenziwe lula ukuthi osomabhizinisi basungule amabhizinisi.

sot: mmuso o lohotha kgonahalo ya ho nehelana ka dibilione tse 2.5 tsa diranta bakeng la letlole lena le bakeng la tshallo ya dibilione tse 7.5 tsa diranta tse tla hlaha lekaleng la poraefete.
zul: ngokusebenzisa isikhungo sokuxhaswa kwamabhizinisi amancane ngezimali – sihlose ukuhlinzeka ngoxhasomali oluyizigidigidi ezingu-1.4 zamarandi kosomabhizinisi abangaphezu kwezi-90 000. uhulumeni, ngokubambisana nesikhwama i-sa sme fund usebenzela ukusungula isikhwama esiyizigidigidi eziyi-10 zamarandi ngenhloso yokweseka ukukhuliswa kwama-smme.

sot: ho fumantshwa ha laksense ha banka ya poso ho tla etsa motheo bakeng la ho thewa ha banka ya mmuso e tla fana ka ditshebeletso tsa ditjhelete ho di-smme, dikgwebo tsa batjha le tsa basadi, le metse e haellwang ke ditshebeletso.
zul: uhulumeni ubheke ukuthi kunokwenzeka yini ukuthi yena ahlinzeke ngoxhasomali oluyizigidigidi ezi-2.5 zamarandi kulesi sikhwama bese kuthi lena enye imali esele eyizigidigidi eziyisi-7.5 zamarandi itholakale kwabomkhakha ozimele.

sot: jwalo ka ha lekgotla la ketsamolao le ntse le shebisisa bili e lokiswang ya banka ya poso, banka ya poso e ntse e hlahloba dihlahiswa tsa yona tsa ditshebeletso e le hore e tle e fane ka tharollo e ka sebetsang le e fihlellehang, e nkelang dibanka tsa kgwebo sebaka.
zul: ukuhlinzekwa kwe-postbank ngelayisensi kuzobeka isisekelo sokusungulwa kwebhange lombuso elizohlinzeka ngezinsizakalo zezimali kuma-smme, amabhizinisi abantu abasha kanye nawabantu besifazane kanye nemiphakathi engakutholi kahle ukuhlinzekwa ngezinsiza ezifanele.

sot: tsela e sebetsang hantle mme e nang le mokoka ya ho aha moruo ke ho fumantsha batho bokgoni le tsebo ya ho o hodisa.
zul: njengoba isigungu sikazwelonke sicubungula isichibiyelo somthethosivivinywa weze-postbank, i-postbank ibuyekeza izinsizakalo ezihlinzekayo ukuze ikwazi ukuhlinzeka ngezinsizakalo ezingasebenziseka ngempumelelo futhi ezingambi eqolo ezingasetshenziswa ngabantu esikhundleni sokusebenzisa amabhange ajwayelekile.

sot: ka hona, re se re nnile ra tshwarana le ho matlafatsa maqhama pakeng tsa bokgoni boo re bo ntshetsang pele le bokgoni boo dibaka tsa mesebetsi di bo hlokang.
zul: indlela esebenza kahle kakhulu futhi engasebenziseka ngempumelelo isikhathi eside yokwakha umnotho wukucija abantu ngamakhono kanye nolwazi lokuthi bangawuqhuba kanjani.

sot: selemong sena, letlole la naha la bokgoni le tla nehelana ka dimilione tse 800 tsa diranta ho ntshetsa pele bokgoni lekaleng la digithale le theknoloji ka motlolo wa boiqapelo o etsang maqhama pakeng tsa ditefello tsa kwetliso le kgonahalo ya ho hirwa.
zul: ngakho-ke besisebenza ngenhloso yokuqinisa ukuxhumana phakathi kwamakhono esiwathuthukisayo kanye namakhono adingwa ngabaqashi endaweni yokusebenzela.

sot: re boetse re hlahisa boipiletso boo re bo entseng ho dikhampani, mafapha le di-soe hore ba tlose tlhokeho ya boiphihlelo ba mosebetsi bakeng la batho ba batjha ba etsang dikopo tsa ba tla qala ho sebetsa.
zul: kulo nyaka, isikhwama sikazweloke samakhono sizohlinzeka ngemali eyizigidi ezingama-800 zamarandi yokuthuthukisa amakhono emkhakheni wezedijithali nowezobuchwepheshe ngokusebenzisa uhlelo olunobuhlakani bokusebenzisa amaqhingasu amasha oluxhumanisa inkokhelo yokuqeqeshwa kanye nemiphumela yokuqashwa.

sot: selemong se fetileng, re itse re tla kenya mosebetsing lenane le kahodimo ho 10 000 la ba fumaneng mangolo a dikoletjhe tsa tekgniki le thuto ya mosebetsi le kwetliso (tvet).
zul: sigcizelela kwikhwelo lethu elibhekiswe ezinkampanini, iminyango kanye nama-soe lokuthi basuse isidingo sokuthi abantu abasha kumele babe nesipiliyoni somsebenzi uma befuna ukuqashwa emisebenzini esesigabeni sokuqala.

sot: re le fetile lenane lena, mme bakeng sa selemo sa 2023 re behile pakana ya lenane la 20 000 la ba nang le mangolo a tvet ba tla kenngwa mesebetsing.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sathi sizofaka emsebenzini abafundi abangaphezu kwezi-10 000 abaphothule izifundo zabo emakolishi ezobuchwepheshe namakhono ezandla nokuqeqeshwa (ama-tvet).

sot: lenane la baithuti ba kenang kwetllisong ya ho ba ditsebi tsa mesebetsi ya matsoho dikoletjheng tsa tvet le tla eketswa ho tloha ho 17 000 ho ya ho 30 000 selemong sa 2023 sa dithuto.
zul: sidlulile kuleli nani futhi manje sesizibekele inani esifuna ukufinyelela kulona ngowezi-2023 labafundi abaphothule kuma-tvet abayizi-20 000. inani labafundi abangenela ukuqeqeshelwa umsebenzi wobungcweti bamakhono ezandla emakolishi angama-tvet lizokhushulwa lisuka kubafundi abayizi-17 000 liyofinyelela kubafundi abayizi-30 000 ngonyaka wemfundo wezi-2023.

sot: e nngwe ya dikarolo tsa bohlokwa bakeng sa kgolo ya moruo le tlhodisano, ke bokgoni ba ho hohela bokgoni boo moruo o bo hlokang.
zul: enye yezinto ezisemqoka kakhulu ekukhulisweni komnotho nokuzibeka ethubeni lokuncintisana kahle yikhono lokuheha amakhono adingwa ngumnotho.

sot: kamora ho phetha tlhahlobo e akaretsang ya sistimi ya di-visa, re tla potlakela ho phethahatsa ditshisinyo tse fanweng.
zul: njengoba sesiwuphothulile umsebenzi obanzi wokubuyekezwa kohlelo lwama-visa omsebenzi, sizoqhubeka ngokushesha ukuqalisa ukusebenza kwezincomo eziphakanyisiwe.

sot: tsona di kenyeletsa sistimi e kgonang haholo ho ikamahanya le diphetoho, e thehetsweng hodima dintlha, ya ho hohela basebetsi ba matswantle ba nang le bokgoni, moo ho sebediswang sekema se tshetjwang sa bahiri ho nolofatsa tshebetso ya di-visa bakeng la boramatsete ba baholo, hape le moo ho nolofatswang ditlhoko tsa dikopo.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukusungulwa kohlelo olusekelwe phezu kwamaphuzu oluguqulekayo ukuze luhambelane nezimo ezihlukahlukene ukuze kuhehwe abantu bakwamanye amazwe abanamakhono, kuqaliswe uhlelo lwabaqashi abathembakele ukuze kwenziwe inqubo ye-visa ibe lula kubatshalimali abakhulu futhi kuhanjelaniswe ngendlela efanele izidingo zokufakwa kwezicelo.

sot: re tla boetse re hlahisa visa e sebetsang ka taolo e hole (rimoutu), le nako ya diteselo tse ikgethileng, bakeng la dikgwebo tse qalang tse nang le bokgoni ba kgolo e phahameng.
zul: sizokwethula futhi ne-visa yabasebenzi abazosebenza bekude nendawo yokusebenzela futhi kube nohlelo olukhethekile lokubhekelela ukusungulwa kwamabhizinisi amasha anamandla nekhono lokukhula ngesivinini futhi anwebeke ngokushesha.

sot: nakong ena eo lenaneo la diphetoho le ntseng le tswela pele, re tla tswela pele ka ho tshehetsa phumantsho ya mesebetsi ya mmuso le ya setjhaba hore ba batlang mesebetsi ba e fumane.
zul: ngenkathi kuqhubeka uhlelo lwezinguquko, sizoqhubeka nokweseka ukuqashwa kwabantu kuhulumeni nasemphakathini ukuze kuhlinzekwe ngomsebenzi kulabo abawudingayo.

sot: selemong se fetileng, re buile ka boleng ba lenaneo la mopresidente la hlasimollo ya mesebetsi le fanang ka menyetla ya mosebetsi le ya boiphediso.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sakhuluma ngosizo lohlelo lukamongameli lokukhuthaza ukuqashwa kwabantu ekuhlinzekeni ngamathuba omsebenzi nawokuziphilisa.

sot: morero ona jwale o se o thehile menyetla e kahodima milione, e fihlellang provinseng e nngwe le e nngwe, esita le seterekeng se seng le se seng ka hara naha ya rona.
zul: manje lolu hlelo seludale amathuba angaphezu kwesigidi esisodwa, futhi selufinyelele kuzo zonke izifundazwe nezifunda ezweni lethu.

sot: bekeng e fetileng, sehlopha se setjha sa bomphato ba 150 000 ba bathusi ba dikolo se qadile mosebetsi dikolong tse kahodimo ho 22 000, e le moo ho fanwang ka seriti, tshepo le boiphihlelo ba mosebetsi ho batho ba batjha ba neng ba sa hirwa.
zul: ngeviki eledlule, iqembu elisha labasebenzi abangabasizi ezikoleni abayizi-150 000 liqalile ukusebenza ezikoleni ezingaphezulu kwezi-22 000, okuyinto ehlinzeke ngesithunzi, ithemba kanye nesipiliyoni somsebenzi esibaluleke kakhulu kubantu abasha abebengasebenzi.

sot: letlole la setjhaba la mesebetsi le tla hira batho ba nang le seabo ba 50 000 mohatong wa lona o latelang bakeng la ho etsa mosebetsi o tla tswela bohle molemo, mme tshebeletso ya naha ya batjha e tsosolotsweng e tla theha menyetla e meng hape e 36 000 ka mekgatlo e sa etseng phaello le mekgatlo ya setjhaba.
zul: isikhwama sokusiza abangasebenzi emphakathini sizoqasha abanye ababambiqhaza abayizi-50 000 esigabeni saso esilandelayo abazokwenza umsebenzi ozohlomulisa umphakathi wonkana, kanti futhi uhlelo lukazwelonke lwemisebenzi yentsha luzokwakha amanye amathuba angeziwe ayizi-36 000 ngokusebenzisa izinhlangano ezingenzi nzuzo kanye nezinhlangano ezisebenzela ngaphakathi emiphakathini.

sot: lefapha la ditaba tsa lehae le se le hirile sehlopha sa pele sa bomphato ba batjha ba 10 000 ba sa sebetseng, e leng moo ba tla kenya dikhomputheng dintlha tsa baahi tse fetang dimilione tse 340 tse ngotsweng dipampiring.
zul: umnyango wezasekhaya usuqashe iqembu lokuqala labantu abasha abangasebenzi abayizi-10 000 abazosusa imininingwane yabantu engaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-340 egcinwe emaphepheni bayifake kumakhompyutha.

sot: jwale tjena ho na le basebedisi ba kahodimo ho dimilione tse tharo ba ingodisitseng ho sa youth.
zul: manje sebengaphezu kwezigidi ezintathu abasebenzisi ababhalisiwe ku-sayouth.

sot: mobi, e leng polatefomo e sa lefeng lekgetho ya inthanete e thusang hore maafrika borwa a batjha a fihlelle menyetla ya ho ithuta le ho amohela meputso.
zul: mobi, okuyinkundla ye-inthanethi okungenwa kuyona mahhala eyenzelwe abantu abasha baseningizimu afrika ukuze bakwazi ukufinyelela emathubeni okufunda kanye nokuzitholela imali.

sot: sena se entswe ka tshebetsonommoho e matla le lekala la naha la ntshetsopele ya batjha (nyda), le ntseng le tswela pele ho fana ka thuso ya bohlokwa ho borakgwebo ba banyenyane le ba batli ba mosebetsi.
zul: lokhu kwenziwe ngokubambisana kanye nokusebenzisana kakhulu nesikhungo sikazwelonke sokuthuthukiswa kwentsha (i-nyda), okuyisikhungo esiqhubekayo nokuhlinzeka ngosizo olukhulu kubantu abasha abangosomabhizinisi kanye nabantu abafuna umsebenzi.

sot: ke thoholetsa nyda e le kannete ka mokgwa oo e thusang batjha ho fumana mosebetsi.
zul: ngiyishayela ihlombe ngempela i-nyda ngendlela elekelela ngayo intsha ukuthi ithole umsebenzi.

sot: lenaneo la mopresidente la tlhasimollo ya mesebetsi le lona le tshehetsa batho hore ba fumane ho iphedisa.
zul: uhlelo lukamongameli lokukhuthaza ukuqashwa kwabantu nalo futhi luyabeseka abantu ukuze bakwazi ukuziphilisa.

sot: balemi ba banyenyane ba fumane divautjhara tse kenyang letsoho tsa ho reka dipeo, monontsha le disebediswa, e leng thuso ya ho ntlafatsa polokeho ya dijo le diphetoho tsa temo.
zul: abalimi abancane abayizi-140 000 bathole amavawusha ezolimo okuthenga imbewu, umanyolo kanye namathuluzi, okuyinto esikhuthaze ukutholakala kokudla okwanele kanye nezinguquko kwezolimo.

sot: morero ona o entse hore ho be le ho lengwa ha mobu wa boholo ba dihektara tse 640 000. karolo e tsotehang e etsang 68% ya balemi bana ke basadi.
zul: lesi sinyathelo sesiholele ekulinyweni komhlaba ongamahektha ayizi-640 000. okuhlaba umxhwele kulokhu wukuthi ama-68% kulaba balimi ngabantu besifazane.

sot: selemong sena, re ikemiseditse ho eketsa lelane la divautjhara tseo re di fang balemi ba banyenyane ka 250 000. ena ke mehlala ya phapang eo mmuso o ka e etsang maphelong a batho ka boiqapelo, boqhetseke le boitlamo.
zul: kulo nyaka, sihlose ukuhlinzeka ngamavawusha angeziwe ayizi-250 000 kubalimi abancane.

sot: maafrika borwa a heso, ditjeo tsa boiphediso tse ntseng di nyoloha di mpefatsa bofuma le ho se lekalekane.
zul: lezi yizibonelo zomehluko ongenziwa nguhulumeni ezimpilweni zabantu ngokusebenzisa amaqhingasu amasha, ukusebenza ngobuhlakani kanye nokuzinikela.

sot: dimilione tsa maafrika borwa ha di kgone ho iphedisa le ho phedisa malapa a tsona.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, izindleko zokuphila ezikhulayo zenza sibe sibi kakhulu isimo sobubha kanye nokungalingani.

sot: ho na le mosadi ya se nang molekane motseng wa alex, ya ngongorehiswang ke hore na o tla etsa jwang hore bophelo bo tswele pele jwalo ka ha ditjeo tsa poone le ditefello tsa ho eta ka tekisi di ntse di tswela pele ho nyoloha.
zul: abantu baseningizimu afrika abayizigidi ngezigidi abakwazi ukuzondla futhi bondle nemindeni yabo.

sot: ho na le mosebetsi wa fektri gqeberha eo hona jwale a tadimaneng le bokamoso bo lerootho jwalo ka ha ho qonolwa ha phepelo ya motlakase ho kgannela ho kwalweng ha tshebetso eo ya ho etsuwa ha dikoloi.
zul: kunomama ozikhulisela abantwana bakhe ngayedwana e-alex, okhathazekile ukuthi uzothathani ahlanganise nani ukuze ondle umndeni wakhe njengoba intengo yommbila kanye nemali yokugibela amatekisi kulokhu kuqhubeke njalo nokukhuphuka.

sot: ka hodima mona, malapa a bahloki a ka bang dimilione tse pedi a fumana tekanyo ya metsi a sa lefellweng, tekanyo ya motlakase o sa lefellweng le tshebeletso e sa lefellweng ya ho thothwa ha ditshila tse tiileng.
zul: kunesisebenzi sefemu e-gqeberha manje esesibhekene nekusasa elingacacile neze kahle njengoba ukucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga kuwumisa nse umsebenzi wokukhiqiza.

sot: e batla e le 60% ya bajete ya rona e sebedisetswang ntho e tsejwang feela e le moputso wa setjhaba, moo ho fanwang ka mekgwa e fapafapaneng ya tshehetso, ditshebeletso tsa motheo le thuso ho malapa le batho ka bomong ho lwantsha bofuma le tlala.
zul: kungumsebenzi wombuso ukuhlinzeka ngokuvikeleka okuyisisekelo lapho kungafanele neze ukuthi kube khona noyedwa umuntu waseningizimu afrika ozithola eyisisulu.

sot: ho tshehetsa mosebetsi ona le ho lwantsha ditlamorao tsa ditjeo tsa bophelo tse nyolohang, re tla tswela pele ka diphallelo tsa kimollo ya setjhaba bakeng la bohlomohi (srd), tseo hajwale di fihlellang batho ba dimilione tse 7.8. re tla netefatsa hore diphallelo tsa setjhaba tse teng hona jwale di a nyollwa molemong wa ho fokotsa boima bo hatellang bahloki ba ho fokotseha ha matla a tjhelete.
zul: njengamanje ezweni lethu, kunabantu abangaphezu kwezigidi ezingama-25 abathola uhlobo oluthile losizo lwesibonelelo-mali.

sot: mosebetsi o se o ntse o etsuwa wa ho hlahisa mokgwa wa tshebetso bakeng la tshehetso ya moputso wa motheo eo re tla e kenya tshebetsong bakeng la ba fokolang ka ho fetisisa, ho latela kamoo bajete ya rona e re dumellang kateng.
zul: ngaphezu kwalokhu, kunamakhaya adla imbuya ngothi abalelwa ezigidini ezimbili athola izinsiza eziyisisekelo zamahhala zokuphakelwa ngamanzi, ugesi kanye nokuthuthelwa imfucuza.

sot: sena se tla sebeletsa hodima boiqapelo boo re bo hlahisitseng ka diphallelo tsa srd, ho kenyeletswa ho hokahanngwa ha datha eo re nang le yona mmusong ka bophara, e le ho netefatsa hore re fihlella ho bohle ba hlokang.
zul: cishe ama-60% esabelomali sethu asetshenziselwa lokho okubizwa ngezibonelelo zikahulumeni, ezihlinzeka ngezinhlobo ezihlukahlukene zosizo, izinsizakalo eziyisisekelo kanye nosizo oluqondiswe emakhaya kanye nomuntu ngamunye ngenhloso yokulwisana nobubha nokuxosha indlala.

sot: ramatlotlo wa setjhaba o ntse a tadimisisa kgonahalo ya mehato e potlakileng ya ho fokotsa boima ba ditheko tsa dijo bo bakwang ke ho qonolwa ha phepelo ya motlakase.
zul: ngenhloso yokweseka lo msebenzi kanye nokulekelela abantu ezindlekweni zokuphila ezilokhu zikhuphuke njalo, sizoqhubeka nokukhipha isibonelelo senhlalo sabangasebenzi (i-srd), njengamanje esifinyelela kubantu ababalelwa ezigidini eziyi-7.8.

sot: selemong sena, re tla nka mehato e tla tswela malapa a futsanehileng molemo ka ho potlakisa ho ntshuwa ha ditokomane tsa borametse bakeng la matlo a tshehetso ya mmuso.
zul: sizoqinisekisa ukuthi ziyakhushulwa izibonelelo zikahulumeni ezikhona njengamanje ukuze sinciphise ukukhahlamezeka kwabantu abampofu ngenxa yokwehla kwamandla emali okudlondlobalayo.

sot: tshallomorao e teng hona jwale tshebetsong ya ho ntshetsa beng ba matlo ditokomane tse ba pakang e kahodimo ho milione ya matlo, e lekanyetswa dibilione tse 242 tsa diranta tsa matlotlo a tshwanelang hore e be a matsohong a malapa a futsanehileng ka ho fetisisa a maafrika borwa.
zul: uyaqhubeka umsebenzi wokuthuthukiswa kohlelo lwesibonelelomali esiyisisekelo esiqondiswe kuphela kulabo bantu abadinga ukubhekelelwa kakhulu abadla imbuya ngothi, uma isimo sezimali sikuvumela lokhu ngoba phela umgodlagodla kahulumeni unezidingo eziningi kanti imali ekhona incane.

sot: ha re tlo tsepamisa maikutlo a rona ho fediseng tshallomorao ena feela, empa le hodima ho etsa hore sistimi ena ya ditokomane tsa thaetlele e be e sebetsang hantle haholo le e fihlellehang haholo.
zul: lokhu kuzokwakhela phezu kweqhingasu elisha lokusebenza esilithulile ngokusebenzisa isibonelelo se-srd, kubandakanya ukuxhunyaniswa kwemininingo esinayo kuhulumeni wonkana ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi siyafinyelela kubo bonke labo abantulayo.

sot: jwalo ka ha re ile ra etsa boitlamo ho sona selemong se fetileng, lefapha la mesebetsi ya setjhaba le metheo ya tshebetso le se le phethile ho neheletswa ha dihektara tse 14 000 tsa mobu wa mmuso bakeng la kaho ya matlo a bodulo.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke wenza izinhlelo zokucubungula ukuthi kungalunga yini uma eqhamuka nezinyathelo eziphuthumayo zokunciphisa umthelela wokucinywa kukagesi ngenhloso yokuwonga emananini okudla.

sot: ho fihleleha ha thuto ya boleng bo botle ho bohle ke sebetsa se matla ka ho fetisisa seo re nang le sona bakeng la ho fedisa bofuma.
zul: kulo nyaka, sizothatha izinyathelo zokulekelela kakhulu amakhaya ampofu ngokuthi sisheshise ukuhlinzekwa kwamatayitela ezindlu zomxhaso.

sot: re tshwanela ho qala ka bana ba sa leng banyenyane haholo, moo re ba fumantshang motheo oo ba o hlokang hore ba tsebe ho ngola le ho bala ka kutlwisiso, ho ithuta le ho hola.
zul: njengamanje ukusalela emuva kwenqubo yokukhishwa kwamatayitela kungaphezu kwezindlu eziyisigidi esisodwa, okuyinani lempahla elinganiselwa kwizigidigidi ezingama-242 zamarandi okufanele ngabe isezandleni zamakhaya ampofu kakhulu aseningizimu afrika.

sot: lefapha la thuto ya motheo le nolofatsa ditlhoko tsa ditsi tsa ecd tsa ho fumana tshehetso, mme ho dumellwe hore ho eketswe lenane la ba fumanang tshehetso ho tswa mmusong ka dikete tse ding hape.
zul: njengoba sazibophezela ku-sona ngonyaka odlule, umnyango wezemisebenzi yomphakathi nengqalasizinda usukuphothulile ukudluliswa kwamahektha omhlaba wombuso ayizi-14 000 ukuze kwakhiwe kuwona izindlu.

sot: ha re le ntlheng e nngwe e phethang leeto la thuto ya motheo, re tlameha ho thoholetsa sekgahla sa katleho ya baithuti ba materiki ba selemo se fetileng sa 80%, moo diprovinse tsohle di bontshitseng diphetho tse ntlafetseng.
zul: ukufinyelela kwabo bonke abantu kwimfundo eseqophelweni eliphezulu yilona thuluzi elinamandla kakhulu esinalo lokuqeda ububha.

sot: karolo ya dikatleho tsa batjhela dikolong tse sa lefellweng ke batswadi e nyolohile ho tloha ho 55% ka selemo sa 2019 ho ya ho 64% ka 2022. sena se bolela hore tshebetso ya baihuti ba dikolong tse futsanehileng e ntse e ntlafala butlebutle, e leng ho pakahatsang boleng ba tshehetso eo mmuso o ba fang yona.
zul: ngakho-ke, kuyinto esemqoka ukuthi inani lezingane ezithola umxhaso ohlelweni lokuthuthukiswa kwezingane zisencane (i-ecd) selifinyelele ngaphezu kokuphindaphindwe kabili phakathi kowezi-2019 nowezi-2022, njengoba selifinyelele ezinganeni eziyisigidi nesigamu.

sot: seo diphetho tsena di se hlahisang ke hore ho na le phetoho e kgutsitseng e etsahalang dikolong tsa rona.
zul: umnyango wezemfundo eyisisekelo uhlela kabusha izidingo zezikhungo ze-ecd ukuze zikwazi ukuthola ukwesekwa futhi ukuze ezinye eziyizinkulungwane ngezinkulungwane zithole imixhaso evela kuhulumeni.

sot: dikolo di tlameha ho bolokeha, mme di dumelle hore ho be le ho ithuta le ho ruta ho etswang hantle.
zul: futhi ngakolunye uhlangothi lohambo lwemfundo eyisisekelo, kumele silishayele ihlombe izinga lokuphumelela kwabafundi bakamatikuletsheni ngonyaka odlule elingama-80%, njengoba futhi zonke izifundazwe zibonise imiphumela engcono kunaleyo eziyithole ngaphambilini.

sot: morero wa matlwana a loketseng thuto – o tsejwang ka hore ke safe – mmoho le morero wa phano e potlakileng ya metheo ya tshebetso dikolong e se e ahile matlwana a nepahetseng a 55 000 ka disebediswa tse tswang lekaleng la mmuso le lekaleng la poraefete.
zul: inani labafundi abaphumelele ngokwezinga elibavumelayo ukuthi benze iziqu ze-bachelor abavela ezikoleni ezingayikhokhisi imali yokufunda likhuphukile lisuka kuma-55% ngowezi-2019 layofinyelela kuma-64% ngowezi-2022.

sot: ho hlahisa bokgoni boo naha ya rona e bo hlokang, re atolla disistimi tsa thuto ya mosebetsi le kwetliso ka ho kenya tshebetsong kharikhulamo e amohetsweng ya motlolo wa metjha e meraro.
zul: lokhu kusho ukuthi ukuphumelela kwabafundi abavela ezikoleni ezimpofu kulokhu kukhuphuke njalo, okuyinto ebonisa ngokusobala ukubaluleka kosizo nokwesekwa okuhlinzekwa nguhulumeni kulezo zikole.

sot: selemong sena, mmuso o rerile ho phetha motlolo o moholo wa letlole la ditjhelete la baithuti bakeng la thuto e phahameng, ka ho toba, bakeng la baithuti ba welang ka thoko ho ditlhoko tsa sekema sa jwale sa naha sa dithuso tsa ditjhelete sa baithuti.
zul: okuboniswa yile miphumela wukuthi kunoguquko olunohlonze olwenzeka buthule ezikoleni zethu.

sot: re matlafaletsa saps ho thibela ditlolo tsa molao, hape re ntlafatsa bokgoni ba lekgotla la naha la botjhotjhisi (npa) le makgotla a dinyewe molemong wa ho netefatsa hore batlodi ba molao ba tliswa ka pele ho makgotla a dinyewe.
zul: ukuze kukhiqizwe amakhono adingwa yizwe lethu, siyalukhulisa uhlelo lwamakhono ezandla nokuqeqeshwa ngokuthi siqalise ukusebenza kwekharikhulamu egunyaziwe yohlelo lwemigudu yemfundo olumikhakha-mithathu.

sot: hona ho kenyeletsa ho beha mapolesa a mangata diterateng, le ho hlophisa dihlopha tse ikgethileng tse tla tsepamisa maikutlo mefuteng e ikgethileng ya ditlolo tsa molao.
zul: kulo nyaka, uhulumeni uhlela ukuphothula uhlelo olubanzi lokuxhaswa kwabafundi ngezimali oluqondiswe emkhakheni wezemfundo ephakeme, ikakhulukazi kubafundi abavaleleke ngaphandle ngenxa yemigomo yokufaneleka yohlelo lukazwelonke lokuxhaswa kwabafundi ngezimali.

sot: ngwahola, re entse boitlamo ba ho hira basebetsi ba batjha ba sepolesa ba 12 000. ho tloha hona hoo, bahiruwa ba batjha ba 10 000 ba fumane mangolo ho tswa dikoletjheng tsa sepolesa, mme ba bang hape ba 10 000 ba tla hirwa ba be ba rupelwe selemong sena.
zul: ukuze sikwazi ukufinyelela kulabo bafundi abangondingasithebeni abaziwa ngokuthi yi-‘missing middle’.

sot: dihlopha tsa sepolesa tse ikgethileng tse sebetsanang le ho lwantsha ditlolo tsa molao tse tshwanang le ho kwetela, boqhekanyetsi le ho rafa ho seng molaong di se di ile tsa ba le dikatleho tse ngata, moo di tshwereng babelaellwa ba sehlopha, hape tsa atleha hore ba be bangata ba ahlolwang.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, ubugebengu obunodlame sebukhahlameze wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika.

sot: ho etsuwa ka matla hore ho lwantshwe tshenyo ya moruo le ditlolo tse amanang le yona tse etsang tshenyo e kgolo moruong.
zul: imiphakathi ezweni lonke ihleli lubhojozi isabela ukuphepha kwemindeni yawo.

sot: ka kgwedi ya tshitwe, mmuso o ile wa hlahisa thibelo ya nakwana ya ho romelwa ntle ha mehala ya koporo e senyehileng le dimetale tse ding e le ho sitisa maqulwana a ditlokotsebe, hape le ho dumella sistimi e ntjha ya kgwebo e tle e kenngwe tshebetsong.
zul: siqinisa i-saps ukuvimbela ubugebengu futhi senza ngcono amandla ophiko lukazwelonke lwezokushushisa (i-npa) kanye nezinkantolo ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abenzi bobubi babhekana nengalo yomthetho.

sot: jwalo ka ha re se re qadile ho etsa diphetoho tsa moruo motlakaseng, metsing, dikgokahanong le ho thothweng ha thepa ka letsholo la vulindlela, re phethahatsa tshebetso ya diphetoho, e le ho ntlafatsa ho sebetsa hantle ha ntwa ya rona e kgahlanong le ditlolo tsa molao.
zul: lokhu kubandakanya ukukhuliswa kwesibalo samaphoyisa emigwaqeni kanye nokusungula amathimba akhethekile azogxila kwizinhlobo ezithile zamacala.

sot: re tla sebedisa bokgoni ba rona ba tlhodisano ditshebetsong tsohle tsa ditsi tsa mehala ho tshehetsa tshebediso e nepahetseng ya mohala wa thuso wa 10111, bolekaneng ba rona le lekala la poraefete.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, sanquma ukuqasha amaphoyisa amasha ayizi-12 000. kusukela lapho, angaphezu kwezi-10 000 amaphoyisa amasha aphothule ukuqeqeshwa kwawo ezikhungweni zokuqeqesha amaphoyisa futhi kunamanye ayizi-10 000 azoqashwa bese eqeqeshwa kulo nyaka.

sot: hona ke ho netefatsa hore ha batho ba letsetsa sepolesa, mehala ya bona e a arajwa, mme ditsietsi tsa bona tsa tshohanyetso di a tsotellwa.
zul: amathimba amaphoyisa akhethekile abhekene ngqo namacala okuthumba, ukuphanga kanye nokumbiwa kwezimbiwa ngokungemthetho asezuze impumelelo emacaleni amaningi, lapho ebophe khona amashumi ngamashumi abasolwa futhi baningi kulaba abalahlwe ngamacala.

sot: re tla boetse re sebedisa diselefouno ka mokgwa o rarahaneng haholo ho tsebahatsa le ho toba dibaka tse kotsing ya ditlolo tsa molao.
zul: kuthathwa izinyathelo ezinqala ukubhekana namacala okucekelwa phansi komnotho ngamabomu kanye namanye amacala ahlobene nalokho, okungamacala adala umonakalo omkhulukazi emnothweni.

sot: ntlheng ya bohlokwa, bajeteng ena tjhelete ya sepolesa le ya karolo e ikgethileng ya diphuputso (siu) di tla eketswa.
zul: amathimba akhethekile amikhakha-miningi okuvikela ingqalasizinda yezomnotho manje enza umsebenzi wawo ezindaweni ezingama-20 ezihlonziwe eziyizizinda zobugebengu.

sot: ditlolo tsa molao tse lebiswang ho basadi le bana e ntse e le letshwao le ngongorehisang la bophelo ba setjhaba sa rona.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngatshela izwe ngomonakalo omkhulukazi odalwa wukwebiwa kwamakhebuli ethusi nensimbi ohlelweni lwethu lukagesi, izintambo zojantshi bezitimela kanye nenye ingqalasizinda yomphakathi.

sot: ka kgwedi ya pudungwana ngwahola, re ile ra tshwara seboka sa bobedi sa mopresidente sa gbvf ho hlahloba tswelopele e ntsweng ho phethahatsweng ha moralo o moholo wa naha, o neng o ile wa amohelwa e le karabelo e kgolo ya rona ya sewa, e sebetsang hantle, hape e kopanetsweng ke bohle.
zul: ngozibandlela, uhulumeni wethule ukumiswa okwesikhashana kokuthunyelwa emazweni angaphandle kwamakhebuli ethusi asesetshenzisiwe kanye nezinsimbi ezithile ezingamasekeni ukuze kunqandwe amaqembu ezigelekeqe futhi kuvunyelwe ukuqaliswa kohlelo olusha lokuhweba.

sot: e nngwe ya dikatleho tse kgolo tsa matsapa a rona a ho lwantsha gbv ke boholo ba kamoo balekane ba setjhaba ba sebeditseng ka matla ho atlehisa moralo ona o moholo wa naha.
zul: njengoba sesiqalise izinguquko zomnotho kwezikagesi, amanzi, ukuxhumana ngobuchwepheshe kanye nokuthuthwa kwempahla ngokusebenzisa umkhankaso i-operation vulindlela, ngakolunye uhlangothi siqalisa inqubo yezinguquko yokuphucula impumelelo yempi yethu yokulwisana nobugebengu.

sot: ka kgwedi ya pherekgong selemong se fetileng, ke ile ka saenela dikarolo tsa bohlokwa tse tharo tsa molao tse fanang ka tshireletso e kgolo ho mahlatsipa a gbv hore e be molao, le ho netefatsa hore baetsi ba bobe ba se ke ba hlola ba sebedisa dikgaello tse teng molaong hore ba qobe ho fumanwa ba le molato.
zul: sizosebenzisa ikhono lethu lokwenza ngobunyoninco futhi ngendlela engambi eqolo umsebenzi wezizinda ezamukela izingcingo ukuze sisekele ukusebenza ngendlela efanele kwenombono yosizo i-10111, ngokubambisana nabomkhakha ozimele.

sot: re ntse re tswela pele ho ntlafatsa ho fihlelleha le tshebetso ya makgotla a ditlolo tse amang bong le ho atolla marangrang a ditsi tsa tlhokomelo tsa thuthuzela.
zul: lokhu kwenzelwa ukuqinisekisa ukuthi uma abantu befonela amaphoyisa, ziyaphendulwa izingcingo zabo futhi izimo eziphuthumayo ababhekene nazo zithathelwa izinyathelo.

sot: karolo ya bohlokwa ya moralo o moholo wa naha ke ho matlafatswa ha basadi ho tsa moruo.
zul: futhi sizosebenzisa ngobuhlakani obukhulu izindlela ezisekelwe kakhulu kwimininingo yolwazi olutholakele ukuhlonza kanye nokugxila ngokuqondileyo ezidlekeni zobugebengu.

sot: ho tloha phatlalatsong ya boikemisetso ba rona ba ho lebisa bonyane 40% ya ditheko tse etsuwang ke mmuso dikgwebong tseo beng ba tsona e leng basadi, re batlile ho theha tikoloho e dumellang le ho tshehetswa ha borakgwebo ba basadi.
zul: ngolwezi ngonyaka odlule, sabamba ingqungquthela kamongameli yesibili ye-gbvf ngenhloso yokuhlola inqubekela phambili esiyenziwe ekuqaliseni uhlelo lweqhingasu likazwelonke, eyamukela ngokusemthethweni uhlelo olubanzi, olusebenza kahle futhi olunokubumbana lokulwisana nalolu bhubhane.

sot: re kwetlisitse dikgwebo tse kahodimo ho 3 400 tsa basadi, re di lokisetsa hore di lokele menyetla ya ho kena thekisetsong.
zul: enye yezimpumelelo ezinkulukazi zomzamo wethu wokulwisana ne-gbv yindlela abalwamukele futhi balweseka ngayo uhlelo lweqhingasu likazwelonke labo esibambisene nabo emphakathini.

sot: ka seboka sa basadi sa moruo, re bone dikopano tsa diindasteri le dikhampani di etsa boitlamo dipakaneng tsa diindasteri tsa diphetoho tsa bong ka bophara.
zul: ngomasingana ngonyaka odlule, ngasayina imithethosivivinywa emithathu esemqoka ukuze ibe yimithetho ezonikeza ukuvikeleka okuthe xaxa kulabo abasinde ku-gbv futhi eqinisekisayo ukuthi abenzi bobubi ngeke besakwazi ukusebenzisa amaqhinga athile awumphumela wobuthakathaka bomthetho ukuze bagweme ukushushiswa.

sot: koporasi ya ntshetsopele ya diindasteri e hlwaile dibilione tse ka bang 9 tsa diranta bakeng la ho tsetelwa dikgwebong tse etellwang pele ke basadi.
zul: siyaqhubeka nokwenza ngcono ukufinyeleleka kanye nokusebenza kwezinkantolo zamacala ezocansi kanye nokwandisa izikhungo zokunakekela, phecelezi, ama-thuthuzela care centres.

sot: dikhampani tse ding, ho kenyeletswa koporasi ya setjhaba ya matsete le letlole la naha la matlafatso, le tsona di entse boitlamo ba ho theha dikoloi tsa tshebediso e ikgethileng ho tshehetsa dikgwebo tseo beng ba tsona e leng basadi.
zul: into esemqoka kakhulu ohlelweni lweqhingasu likazwelonke wukufukulwa nokuhlonyiswa kwabesifazane kwezomnotho.

sot: selemong se fetileng, ke ile ka re re tla nka mohato o tiileng kgahlanong le bobodu, mme re hlakolele ruri nako ya ho hulwa ka nko ha puso.
zul: kusukela ngamemezela ukuzimisela kwethu ukuthi okungenani ama-40% empahla nezinsizakalo ezithengwa nguhulumeni kumele kuthengwe emabhizinisini abesifazane, sihlose ukwenza isimo esikahle esizovumela ukwesekwa kosomabhizinisi besifazane.

sot: khomishene ya ho hulwa ha puso ka nko e neng e eteletswe pele ke moahlodi e moholo raymond zondo e ile ya phetha mosebetsi wa yona, mme ya nehelana ka karolo ya ho qetela ya tlaleho ya yona ka kgwedi ya phuptjane ngwahola.
zul: sesiqeqeshe amabhizinisi abesifazane angaphezu kwezi-3 400, ukuze siwalungiselele ukusebenzisa amathuba okuhlinzeka ngempahla nezinsizakalo kuhulumeni.

sot: re le naha, re na le molato o moholo wa teboho e yang ho moahlodi e moholo zondo, basebetsi ba khomishene, le bohle ba ileng ba fana ka bopaki bakeng la mosebetsi wa bona o tswileng matsoho wa setjhaba.
zul: ngokusebenzisa ingqungquthela yabesifazane yezomnotho, sesibone izinhlangano nezinkampani zemboni zizibophezela ekufinyeleleni emigomweni ebekiwe yoguquko oluphathelene nezobulili embonini yonkana.

sot: ditshisinyo tsa khomishene di ntse di phethahatswa ho latela morero oo ke ileng ka o neha palamente ka pudungwana ngwahola e le hore dintlha tsa bofokodi ba tsamaiso tse tsebahaditsweng ke khomishene ho tle ho sebetsanwe le tsona, mme ho hulwa ha puso ka nko ho se hlolwe ho dumellwa hape.
zul: inhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwezimboni seyibeke eceleni imali elinganiselwa kwizigidigidi eziyisi-9 zamarandi ezotshalwa emabhizinisini aholwa ngabesifazane.

sot: lekgotla la naha la boeletsi la twantsho ya bobodu, le theilweng ka batho ba tswang setjhabeng sa rona ka bophara, le se le le teng ho eletsa malebana le mehato ya ho motsula bobodu, ho kenyeletswa ho ntjhafatswa ha kaho ya setheo sa ho fedisa bobodu.
zul: ezinye izikhungo, kubandakanya inhlangano yezokutshalwa kwezimali zikahulumeni kanye nesikhwama sikazwelonke sokufukula nokuhlomisa abantu abamnyama, nazo sezizibophezelelile ukuthi zizosungula izinhlelo ezikhethekile ezenzelwe kuphela umsebenzi wokweseka amabhizinisi abesifazane.

sot: re tla phetha moralo wa bili ya ho reka ha puso molemong wa ho sebetsana le dintlha tsa bofokodi tse tsebahaditsweng ke khomishene ya ho hulwa ha puso ka nko, mme re ntlafatse ho sebetsa hantle, boleng ba tjhelete le ponaletso.
zul: ngonyaka odlule, ngathi sizothatha izinyathelo ezinqala zokulwisana nenkohlakalo futhi ukuze siphume siphele esikhathini sokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane.

sot: makala a rona a tsosolotsweng a phethahatso ya molao a etsa tshebetso e tiileng kgahlanong le dikhampani le batho bao ho belaelwang hore ba bile le seabo ho hulweng ha puso ka nko.
zul: ikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane ephethwe yinhloko yamajaji u-raymond zondo isiwuphothulile umsebenzi wayo futhi iyithumelile ingxenye yokugcina yombiko wayo ngonhlangulana wonyaka odlule.

sot: lekala la npa la diphuputso, leo ke le thehileng ka selemo sa 2019, le se le hlahisitse ka pele ho makgotla a dinyewe batho ba 187 ba qositsweng bakeng la dinyewe tse 32 tsa ho hulwa ha puso ka nko le bobodu.
zul: njengezwe, kumele sibonge sinconcoze kwinhloko yamajaji uzondo, abasebenzi bekhomishani kanye nabo bonke labo abethula ubufakazi ngomsebenzi omkhulukazi abawenzela isizwe.

sot: ke dibilione tse 7 tsa diranta tseo ho fihlela jwale di seng di buseleditswe mmuso ho tswa dinyeweng tsa ho hulwa ha puso ka nko.
zul: izincomo zekhomishani ziyaqaliswa ngokohlelo engaluthumela ephalamende ngomfumfu ngonyaka odlule ukuze ukuntengantenga nobuthakathaka obukhona obahlonzwa yikhomishani kubhekwane ngqo nako futhi ukuze singalokothi neze sikuvumele ukubanjwa ngobhongwane kombuso.

sot: bofokodi ba rona bo boholo bo dikgwebong tsa mmuso le pusong ya dibaka.
zul: usuqalile umsebenzi wokwenza ngcono ukufinyelela ohlelweni lokuvikelwa kofakazi kwabasebenzi bakahulumeni abaveza obala izenzo zokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, inkohlakalo kanye nokuziphatha okungenaso isimilo nobuqotho.

sot: boholo ba di-soe tsa rona bo tlasa kgatello ya dikoloto, matsete a fokolang metheong ya tshebetso, ditlamorao tsa ho hulwa ha puso ka nko, le kgaello ya bokgoni.
zul: sizophothula uhlaka lomthethosivivinywa wokuthengwa kwempahla nezinsizakalo ezidingwa nguhulumeni ukuze silungise ubuthakathaka nokungahanjiswa kwezinto ngendlela okwahlonzwa yikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane futhi senze ngcono ukusebenza, uhulumeni athole imbuyiselomali enhle ngemali ayisebenzisile futhi kusetshenzwe ngendlela evulelekile nesobala.

sot: re tla phethahatsa tshisinyo ya lekgotla la mopresidente la di-soe ya ho theha khampani ya mmuso ya ho tshwara e le karolo ya motlolo o bohareng wa thuo ya matlotlo o tla netefatsa bolaodi bo sebetsang hantle ba di-soe.
zul: izimpiko zethu zokugcina umthetho esezinogqozi nofuqufuqu olusha zithatha izinyathelo ezinqala ezinkampanini nakubantu abasolwa ngokubandakanyeka ekubanjweni kombuso ngobhongwane.

sot: ka thoko ho moo, ke laetse ofisi ya mopresidente le ramatlotlo wa setjhaba ho sebetsa mmoho ho hlophisa botjha mafapha a mmuso, dikgwebo le mananeo nakong ya dilemo tse tharo tse tlang.
zul: uphiko lwezokuphenya amacala lwe-npa, engalusungula ngowezi-2019, selubizele enkantolo abasolwa abayi-187 emacaleni angama-32 okubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane kanye nenkohlakalo.

sot: ramatlotlo wa setjhaba o akanya hore re ka fihlella poloko e ka bang teng ya dibilione tse 27 tsa diranta nakong e mahareng haeba re ka ra sebetsana le ditaelo tse pharallanang, ra kwala mananeo a sa sebetseng hantle, hape ra kopanya dikgwebo moo ho tshwanelang.
zul: kuze kube manje iyizigidigidi eziyisi-7 zamarandi imali esibuyiselwe kumbuso evela emacaleni okubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane.

sot: mmuso o phethahatsa mehato e mengata ya ho sebetsana le mefokolo boemong ba puso ya dibaka le ho ntlafatsa phepelo ya ditshebeletso tsa motheo.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, ukuze kwenziwe noma iyiphi inqubekela phambili ekusombululeni izinselele eziphuthumayo esibhekene nazo, sidinga umbuso onamandla futhi onekhono lokusebenza kahle.

sot: tsena di kenyeletsa ho ntlafatswa ha bokgoni ba baemedi ba mmuso le basebeletsi, ho lokiswa le ho ntlafatswa ha metheo ya tshebetso ya dibaka, ho rapela batshwari ba puso ya dibaka hore ba nke mehato moo bommasepala ba hlolehang ho phetha boikarabelo ba bona.
zul: ubuthakathaka bethu obukhulu busemabhizinisini ombuso nakohulumeni basekhaya.

sot: tshebeletso ya setjhaba e nang le tsebo, e nang le basebetsi ba nang le bokgoni, batho ba inehetseng hape ba sebetsang ka toka, ke ya bohlokwa haholo bakeng la puso e sebetsang hantle, esita le ho fediseng bobodu, tshekisetso le tshenyo.
zul: iningi lama-soe ethu licwile ezikweletini ezinzima, utshalomali alufakwa kahle kwingqalasizinda, futhi libhekene nemithelela yokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane kanye kunokushoda kwamakhono.

sot: karabelong ya khomishene ya ho hulwa ha puso ka nko le ho ipapisa le moralo wa ho etsa hore tshebeletso ya mmuso e be ya ditsebi, diteko tsa botshepehi e tla ba setlamo bakeng la batho ba hirwang tshebeletsong ya mmuso, le ditlhahlobo tsa ba qalang mosebetsi di tla etswa.
zul: sizokuqalisa ukusebenza kwesincomo somkhandlu kamongameli wama-soe sokusungula inkampani ezoba ngumnikazi wamabhizinisi ombuso njengengxenye yohlelo lokubeka amandla obunikazi bomnikazimasheya ezandleni zesikhungo esisodwa oluzoqinisekisa ukuthi umsebenzi wokuqapha ama-soe wenziwa ngendlela efanele.

sot: re lokisa melao, hape re matlafatsa tema ya khomishene ya tshebeletso ya setjhaba ya ho netefatsa hore batho ba hirwang dibakeng tsa balaodi ba baholo e be ba nang le mangolo a mosebetsi, le ho habela ho theheng tshebeletso ya setjhaba e le nngwe, le e kopaneng.
zul: okunye okuseceleni okwehlukile wukuthi sengiyalele ihhovisi likamongameli kanye nomgcinimafa kazwelonke ukuthi basebenzisane ekuhlelweni kabusha kweminyango, izikhungo kanye nezinhlelo zikahulumeni kule minyaka emithathu ezayo.

sot: ditho tse kgabane, jwalo ka ha re inehetse ho ntlafatseng bokamoso ba banna le basadi ba naha ya rona le ho ntshetseng pele katleho e kopanetsweng bakeng la bohle, boinehelo ba rona le bona bo jwalo le tabeng ya ho atleha ho bopa afrika e ntle le lefatshe le letle.
zul: umgcinimafa kazwelonke ulinganisela ekutheni kungenzeka kongiwe imali eyizigidigidi ezingama-27 zamarandi esikhathini esimaphakathi uma kulungiswa inkinga yamagunya afanayo enziwa ngokungenasidingo yiminyango nezikhungo ezahlukene, kuvalwe nezinhlelo ezingasebenzi kahle futhi kuhlanganiswe izikhungo ezahlukene zibe yisikhungo esisodwa lapho kufanelekile.

sot: re ngongorehiswa haholo ke ho eketseha haholo ha dikgohlano pakeng tsa baahi ba iseraele le baahi ba palestina, mme re etsa boipiletso ba phediso ya ho tsohelana matla, le hore ho tsoseletswe tshebetso e ileng ya tlohelwa ya ho bopa kgotso.
zul: omasipala bethu abaningi kakhulu, abayi-163 komasipala abangama-257, abasebenzi neze kahle noma basobishini ngenhla yokungaphathi ngendlela efanele, nokungasebenzi kahle futhi kwesinye sikhathi ngenxa yenkohlakalo ekuphathweni kwezimali nokulawulwa kwemisebenzi yomasipala kanye nokungathunyelwa kwezidingongqangi ngendlela efanele.

sot: afrika borwa e lebisa matshediso a yona a tebileng ho mmuso le batho ba naha ya turkiye kamorao ho ho reketla ha lefatshe ho thefulang maikutlo ho etsahetseng pejana bekeng ena.
zul: uhulumeni uqalisa izinhlelo zokungenelela eziningana ngenhloso yokulungisa ukuhluleka okukhona ezingeni lohulumeni basekhaya futhi kwenziwe ngcono nokuhlinzekwa kwezidingongqangi.

sot: bokamoso ba afrika borwa bo hokelane haholo le ba dinaha tsa kontinente ya rona, le tsa lebatowa le ka borwa la ntshetsopele, ka ho tobileng.
zul: umkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni osebenza ngobungoti nobunyoninco, onabasebenzi abanamakhono, abazinikele futhi abanobuqotho, usemqoka kakhulu embusweni osebenza kahle kanye nasekuqedeni inkohlakalo, ukuqasha ngokwenzelela ngokusebenzisa amandla ngokungafanele kanye nokumosha.

sot: molemong wa botsitso le tswelopele ya rona, re a tlameha ho nka mehato e tla tlisa kgotso, botsitso le ntshetsopele kontinenteng ya rona.
zul: ngenhloso yokusabela nokufezekisa lokho okushiwo yikhomishani ephenya ngokubanjwa kombuso ngobhongwane futhi ngokuhambisana nohlaka lokwenziwa komkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni usebenze ngobuchule nobunyoninco, ukuhlolwa kwesimilo nobuqotho kuzoba yisidingo esiphoqelekile uma kuqashwa abasebenzi emkhakheni wezemisebenzi kahulumeni futhi kuzokwethulwa ukuhlolwa kwalabo abagaqele ukungena futhi basebenze kulo mkhakha.

sot: re tla tswela pele ho atolla menyetla ya kgwebo le matsete re sebetsa mmoho le balekane ba rona ba kgwebo ba matjhaba mme re tla leka ho hohella matsete le dithuso tsa ditjhelete afrika borwa ka seabo sa rona diforamong tse kopanyang mebuso tse kang g20, eo re tla e tshwarela naheng ya rona ka selemo sa 2025. selemong sena, afrika borwa e nka bodulasetulo ba sehlopha sa dinaha tsa brazil, russia, india le afrika borwa.
zul: sichibiyela imithetho futhi siqinisa indima yekhomishani yezemisebenzi kahulumeni ukuqinisekisa ukuthi ngabantu abanezicucu zemfundo nolwazi lomsebenzi olufanelekile abaqashwa ezikhundleni zokuphatha eziphezulu futhi ukuze sikwazi ukuqalisa umsebenzi wokwakha umkhakha wezemisebenzi kahulumeni owodwa futhi osebenza ngendlela ehambelanayo.

sot: re tla tsepamisa maikutlo ho tshebetsommoho ya ntshetsopele e nang le mokoka, phetoho e lokileng ya eneji, boindasteri le phethahatso ya sebaka sa kgwebo e lokolohileng kontinenteng ya afrika.
zul: malungu ahloniphekile, njengoba sizibophezele ekwenzeni ngcono isimo senhlalo nempumelelo yabesilisa nabesifazane bakuleli kanye nasekuthuthukiseni ukuchuma komuntu wonke, ngokunjalo futhi sizibophezele nasekufezekiseni i-afrika engcono kanye nomhlaba ongcono.

sot: afrika borwa, mmoho le baahisani ba rona kopanong ya mokhafisong ya afrika e ka borwa, re tla phetha haufinyane tlhahiso ya rona ya indasteri sebakeng sa kgwebo e lokolohileng kontinenteng ya afrika.
zul: sikhathazeke kakhulu ngokudlondlobala kamuva nje kwengxabano phakathi kwabantu bakwa-israel kanye nabantu base-palestine, futhi siyanxusa ukuthi kuphele ukungqubuzana futhi kuqaliswe kabusha inqubo emileyo njengamanje yokuletha uxolo.

sot: maafrika borwa a heso, semelo sa sebele sa setjhaba se bonahala dinakong tsa tlokotsi.
zul: iningizimu afrika izwakalisa ukuzwelana kwayo okukhulu nohulumeni kanye nabantu base-türkiye kulandela ukuzamazama komhlaba okudale umonakalo omkhulu ngasekuqaleni kwaleli viki.

sot: naha e hlaloswa ke kamoo batho ba yona ba tadimanang le mathata a maholo ka ho fetisisa – hore na ba sebetsa mmoho, mme ba tobane le diphephetso ba le ngatananngwe, ba kopantswe ke morero o le mong, kapa hore na ba inehela mathateng a ka pele ho bona.
zul: njengezwe siziqhenya kakhulu ngemizamo yenhlangano i-gift of the givers yokusiza labo abakhahlanyezwe wukuzamazama komhlaba.

sot: re setjhaba se phamotsweng ke diphephetso tsa nako ena, empa re boetse re setjhaba se lekang ka matla ho phethahatsa tshepo ya bokamoso ba rona.
zul: sisalokhu sikhathazeke kakhulu ngempi eqhubekayo phakathi kwe-russia ne-ukraine futhi siyabanxusa bonke abathintekayo ukuba babeke phansi izikhali futhi bazame ukuthola isixazululo esinokuthula ngokuthi kuxoxiswane.

sot: ha re ne re nka mehato ya rona ya pele tseleng e yang demokrasing, re ile ra ba le pono e hlakileng ya hore na tsela eo e tla re fihlisa kae.
zul: impumelelo yeningizimu afrika incike kakhulu kuleyo yezwekazi lethu, ikakhulukazi isifunda samazwe angaphansi kwenhlangano yokuthuthukiswa kwamazwe aseningizimu ne-afrika.

sot: re ile ra bona naha eo ho yona re ka dulang ka kgotso, le eo ho yona re ka sebetsang mmoho ho aha boitsebiso bo tshwanang, le bokamoso bo kopanetsweng.
zul: ngenxa yokucabangela uzinzo nokuchuma kwakuleli, sinesibopho sokwenza imizamo yokungenelela ezoletha ukuthula, uzinzo kanye nentuthuko ezwekazini lethu.

sot: setjhaba sa rona se thehetswe hodima molao wa motheo o netefatsang makgabane a demokrasi a seriti, tekatekano le tokoloho, le ditokelo tsa e mong le e mong wa rona.
zul: sizoqhubeka nokwandisa amathuba okuhwebelana nokutshalwa kwezimali namazwe esibambisene nawo kwezohwebo emhlabeni futhi sizozama ukuheha utshalomali kanye nokuxhaswa ngezimali kweningizimu afrika ngokusebenzisa ukubamba iqhaza kwethu kwizigcawu ezibandakanya amazwe ahlukahlukene ezinjenge-g20, okuyisigcawu esizosisingatha ngowezi-2025.

sot: di tla re dumella, ha re sebetsa mmoho le ka morero, ho tswa ka hara tlokotsi re le setjhaba se fetohileng.
zul: sizogxila kubambiswano maqondana nentuthuko esimeme, ukuguqukela emandleni kagesi ohlanzekile ngendlela enobulungiswa nobuqotho, ukusungulwa kwezimboni kanye nokuqaliswa kwendawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini lase-afrika.

sot: re tla tswa ka hara tsietsi ena re na le sistimi ya motlakase e sebetsang hantle haholo, e tshepahalang haholo, hape e lokelanang le tlhodisano.
zul: iningizimu afrika, ngokuhlanganyela nomakhelwane bayo kwinhlangano yamazwe aseningizimu ne-afrika angakhokhisani intela yezimpahla ezingenayo neziphumayo emingceleni, phecelezi, i-southern african customs union, khona maduze nje izophothula isiphakamiso sethu esiphathelene nezimboni kwindawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini lase-afrika.

sot: re tla tswa re na le dibaka tsa boemakepe le diterene tse qothisanang lehlokwa le tse ntle ka ho fetisisa lefatsheng, le inthanete e fihlellehang ho maafrika borwa a mangata dibakeng tse ngata tsa naha, le phepelo e nang le mokoka ya metsi.
zul: uma seyisebenza ngokuphelele, indawo-sifunda yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwekazini izohlinzeka ngethuba eliyingqayizivele lokuqinisa ukudidiyelwa kwe-afrika kwezomnotho, ukukhuliswa kweminotho yamazwe, kanye nokuvulelwa kwezinkampani zaseningizimu afrika imingcele emisha kanye nezimakethe.

sot: re tla amohela bahahlaodi ba bangata haholo naheng ya rona, hape re tla ntshetsa pele le ho theha bokgoni boo moruo wa rona o bo hlokang.
zul: bantu bakithi baseningizimu afrika, isimobunjalo soqobo sesizwe sivela obala lapho kubhekenwe nesimo esinzima.

sot: re tla theha mesebetsi bakeng la bao ba sa sebetseng, hape re fane ka tshepo ho bao ba ileng ba ema ka nako e telele.
zul: isizwe sizibonakalisa ubunjalo baso ngendlela abantu baso ababhekana ngayo nobunzima obukhulu – sizibonakalisa ngokuthi siyakwazi yini ukusebenzisana ngokuhlanganyela futhi sibhekane ngqo nezinselele zaso njengesizwe esisodwa, esibunjaniswe yinhloso efanayo, noma-ke siyisizwe esithi maluju, siphonse ithawula ezinkingeni esibhekene nazo.
